This measurement provides the number of bytes transferred on this #SA# so far.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IPsec_PIU
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IPsec_PIU area.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIssMd5Mismatch
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of times the comparison between the given value and the calculated (with md5 algorithm) value did not match.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: Check the #IPsec# configuration. Most probably the wrong authentication keys for one or more #SA#s are used. Many forms of data corruption, that is bit errors in the packets, can also cause the authentication to fail.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIncorrectPackets
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #IPsec# and #GRE# packets discarded in the #IPsec# engine.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds it's supervised threshold: Check the available #IPsec# and #GRE# measurement types. Most probably, an #SA# has not been set up as it should, either locally or on the sending side.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIssOutOkPackets
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #IPsec# and #GRE# packets which has been processed correctly, going out.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecWaPacketsProcessed
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #IPsec# and #GRE# header events. The counter is incremented by one every time an #IPsec# or #GRE# header is added or removed.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIssInOkPackets
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #IPsec# or #GRE# packets which has been processed correctly, coming in.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIssIllegalSpi
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of incoming #IPsec# and #GRE# packets for which no configuration is found in #SADB#.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: Check the #IPsec# and #GRE# configuration. Most probably, an #SA# has not been set up as it should, either locally or on the sending side.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: ipsecIssSha1Mismatch
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of times the comparison between the given value and the calculated (through the sha1 algorithm) value did not match.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: Check the #IPsec# configuration. Most probably the wrong authentication keys for one or more #SA#s are used. Many forms of data corruption, that is, bit errors in the packets, can also cause the authentication to fail.
Note: This counter is only applicable to MkVI and MkVI+. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IPv4v6_PIU
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IPv4v6_PIU area.

EntityDef.name: ipv4v6ForwardingHwNetTableUtilization
EntityDef.description:
This measurement shows how many percent of the total number of available network routes in the LC L3 switching HW that are currently utilized (for all VPNs). This is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 since they share the same HW resource. When the HW routing table is full, outbound traffic may be forwarded in SW which leads to a lower forwarding capacity.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold:
To minimize the number of routes and to decrease the HW table utilization, it is recommended to use OSPF NSSA or route aggregation in the site routers.

EntityDef.name: ipv4v6ForwardingHwHostTableUtilization
EntityDef.description:
This measurement shows how many percent of the total number of available host routes in the Line Card (LC) L3 switching HW that are currently utilized (for all VPNs). This is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 since they share the same HW resource.
When the HW routing table is full, outbound traffic may be forwarded in SW which leads to a lower forwarding capacity.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold:
To minimize the number of routes and to decrease the HW table utilization, it is recommended to use OSPF NSSA or route aggregation in the site routers.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IPv6_RouterInstance
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IPv6_RouterInstance area.

EntityDef.name: ipv6ForwardingTableEntries
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of IPv6 routes currently in the forwarding table.
The SCXB allows a maximum of 120 IPv6 routes in the forwarding table of each IP network. Exceeding this limit causes loss of connectivity.
This measurement type is indexed by IP indexing option 2, MagId.SlotId.Network only.
When the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold, reduce the number of static routes configured on the SGSN-MME.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InAddrErrors
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because the #IP# address in their #IP# header's destination field was not valid.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6OutNoRoutes
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of locally generated #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because no route could be found to transmit them to their destination.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6ForwDatagrams
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input datagrams for which this entity is not the final #IPv6# destination, and so an attempt is made to find a route to forward the input datagrams to the #IPv6# destination.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InTruncatedPkts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because the datagram frame didn't carry enough data.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InReceives
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of input #IPv6# datagrams received from interfaces, including those received in errors.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InHdrErrors
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity, due to errors in their #IP# headers. This includes version number mismatch, other format errors, hop count exceeded, errors discovered in processing their #IP# options, and the like.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IPv6_PIU
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IPv6_PIU area.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InTruncatedPkts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because the datagram frame didn't carry enough data.

EntityDef.name: ipv6ForwDatagrams
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input datagrams for which this entity is not the final #IPv6# destination, and so an attempt is made to find a route to forward the input datagrams to the #IPv6# destination.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6ForwTableEntriesTotal
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of IPv6 routes currently in all forwarding tables on the LC.
The SGSN-MME has the following limits on route numbers: - The SMXB supports a total maximum of 8,000 IPv6 routes in all forwarding tables of each LC. - The SMXB has no limit on the number of IPv6 routes in the forwarding table of each IP network. Exceeding these limits causes loss of connectivity.
Do the following when the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: - Reduce the number of static routes configured on the SGSN-MME. - Reduce the number of routes exported to the SGSN-MME from external routers.

EntityDef.name: ipv6OutNoRoutes
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of locally generated #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because no route could be found to transmit them to their destination.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InHdrErrors
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity, due to errors in their #IP# headers. This includes version number mismatch, other format errors, hop count exceeded, errors discovered in processing their #IP# options, and the like.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InAddrErrors
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of input #IPv6# datagrams discarded on all logical networks on this entity because the #IP# address in their #IP# header's destination field was not valid.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: ipv6InReceives
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of input #IPv6# datagrams received from interfaces, including those received in errors.
This measurement counts signalling IPv6 packets.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_MM_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_MM_G area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttachedLost.G
EntityDef.description: The number of attached mobiles lost due to any crash or restart except node restart and large restart. The measurement is collected and aggregated periodically. The accuracy may therefore be affected at repeated restarts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_MM_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_MM_U area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttachedLost.U
EntityDef.description: The number of attached mobiles lost due to any crash or restart except node restart and large restart. The measurement is collected and aggregated periodically. The accuracy may therefore be affected at repeated restarts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_ConnectionRestarts
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_ConnectionRestarts area.

EntityDef.name: gsnAutomaticConnectionRestarts
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of automatic connection restarts. The counter is incremented when an error is detected in the software which handles a single subscriber (#MS#) and results in an automatic connection restart.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of a high rate of automatic connection restarts of a single subscriber. Only if this continues over a longer period of time, there is need to further investigate the cause.

EntityDef.name: gsnManualConnectionRestarts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of manually deleted subscribers. The counter is incremented when an operator manually deletes a subscriber, that is, an #MS# by using the delete_subscriber CLI command.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_SM_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_SM_G area.

EntityDef.name: SM.PdpContextsLost.G
EntityDef.description: The number of PDP contexts lost due to any crash or restart except node restart and large restart. The measurement is collected and aggregated periodically. The accuracy may therefore be affected at repeated restarts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_SM_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_SM_U_ area.

EntityDef.name: SM.PdpContextsLost.U
EntityDef.description: The number of PDP contexts lost due to any crash or restart except node restart and large restart. The measurement is collected and aggregated periodically. The accuracy may therefore be affected at repeated restarts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LocationServices_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LocationServices_G area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LsPagingSucc.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful paging procedures initiated due to location service, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or resending of the paging request. This counter is incremented each time a paging procedure, due to location service, is successfully concluded.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LsPagingAtt.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted paging procedures due to the location service. The counter is incremented when a paging procedure is started due to location service, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by paging messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new location service from a GMLC is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with IMSI (due to abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestAtt.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted location service request procedures in the #SGSN#. Trigger: Sending the BSSGP Perform Location Request message to the #BSS# over the Gb interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestSucc.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful location service request procedures in the #SGSN#. Trigger: Reception of the Perform Location Response message from the #BSS# over the Gb interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LocationServices
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LocationServices area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MtlrSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #MT-LR# procedures in the #SGSN#. The procedure is considered successful when the #RAN# has provided an estimation of the MS's location. Trigger: Sending the Provide Subscriber Location Response message to the #GMLC# over the Lg interface with a successful result code.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MtlrAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MT-LR# procedures in the #SGSN#. Trigger: Reception of a Provide Subscriber Location Request message from the #GMLC# over the Lg interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LocationServices_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LocationServices_U area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LsPagingAtt.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted paging procedures due to the location service. The counter is incremented when a paging procedure is started due to location service, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by paging messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new location service from a GMLC is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with IMSI (due to abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestSucc.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report messages with the "direct" request type received by the SGSN. This counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a RANAP Location Report message with the "direct" request type from the RNC over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LsPagingSucc.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful paging procedures initiated due to location service, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or resending of the paging request. This counter is incremented each time a paging procedure, due to location service, is successfully concluded.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestAtt.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Reporting Control messages with the "direct" request type sent by the SGSN. This counter is incremented when the SGSN sends a RANAP Location Reporting Control message with the "direct" request type to the RNC over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LogicalLinkControl_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LogicalLinkControl_G area.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesCipheredWithGea2
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames ciphered using #GEA2# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesCipheredWithGea3
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames ciphered using #GEA3# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: errLlcFramesDetectedBySgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of erroneously received #LLC# frames in case of error detection in the #SGSN# (uplink transmission, #SGSN#).

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames sent by the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesCipheredWithGea1
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames ciphered using #GEA1# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesDecipheredWithGea2
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames deciphered using #GEA2# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesDecipheredWithGea1
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames deciphered using #GEA1# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of received #LLC# frames by the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: nbrLlcFramesDecipheredWithGea3
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LLC# frames deciphered using #GEA3# algorithm.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_MBMS
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the MBMS area.

EntityDef.name: SM.NbrActSessions
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active MBMS sessions in this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_MSCPool
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the MSCPool area.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrGsAssociatedSubMSC.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of MSs for which the SGSN has Gs associations with an MSC. This gauge is counted per MSC.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_hho_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_hho_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.HHO.SuccIntraMme
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-#MME# Handover procedures.
Trigger: Reception of S1 Handover Notify message from the target #eNodeB#, when the Target #TA# is situated under an own #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.HHO.AttIntraMme
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-#MME# Handover procedures.
Trigger: Reception of S1 Handover Required message from the source #eNodeB#, when the Target #TA# is situated under an own #MME#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_hho_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_hho_G area.

EntityDef.name: HHO.SuccInterSGSNNew
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of successful Inter PS Handover procedures in new SGSN. Trigger: Sending of Forward Relocation Complete GTP-C message to sourceSGSN GSM.

EntityDef.name: HHO.SuccOptIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of successful Optimized PS Handover procedures. Trigger: Reception of PS Handover Complete BSSGP message from BSS when no PS Handover Required has been received

EntityDef.name: HHO.AttOptIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of Optimized PS Handover attempts, including possible retransmissions. Trigger: Reception of PS Handover Complete BSSGP message from BSS when no PS Handover Required has been received.

EntityDef.name: HHO.AttInterSGSNNew
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of Inter PS Handover attempts in new SGSN, including possible retransmissions. Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Request GTP-C message from oldSGSN GSM.

EntityDef.name: HHO.AttInterSGSNOld
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of Inter #PS# Handovers attempts in old #SGSN#, including possible retransmissions. Trigger: Reception of #PS# Handover Required #BSSGP# message from #BSS# when Target #RA# is situated under cooperating #SGSN# or is unknown to own #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: HHO.SuccIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of successful Intra PS Handover procedures. Trigger: Reception of PS Handover Complete BSSGP message from BSS

EntityDef.name: HHO.SuccInterSGSNOld
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of successful PS Handover procedures in old SGSN. Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Complete GTP-C message from targetSGSN GSM.

EntityDef.name: HHO.AttIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement type counts the number of Intra #PS# Handover attempts, including possible retransmissions. Trigger: Reception of #PS# Handover Required #BSSGP# message from #BSS# when Target #RA# is situated under own #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_HO_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_HO_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2FailDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of X2-based Handover procedures that have failed due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a Path Switch Request Failure message with a failure cause is sent to the target eNB because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeAttSourceMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Handover procedures over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when the Handover Required arrives at the source MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.IntraMmeFailRR.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-MME S1-based Handover procedures that have failed due to Roaming Restrictions.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeTargetMmeDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-MME S1-based handover procedures, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported by the target MME, but the handover procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeAttTargetMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Handover procedures over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when Forward Relocation Request arrives at the target MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeSuccTargetMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter MME Handover procedures over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when the Handover Notify message arrives at the target MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeSuccSourceMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter MME Handover procedures over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when the Forward Relocation Complete Notification arrives at the source MME from the target MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.IntraMmeFailRS.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-MME S1-based Handover procedures that have failed due to Regional Subscription.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2Att.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted X2-based Handover procedures. Trigger: Receiving the S1-AP Path Switch Request message from the target eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2FailRS.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful X2-based Handover procedures that have failed due to Regional Subscription.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2Succ.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful X2-based Handover procedures. Trigger: Sending the S1-AP Path Switch Request Acknowledge message to the target eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1IntraMmeFailDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-MME Handover procedures over the S1 interface that have failed due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a Handover Preparation Failure message with a failure cause is sent to the source eNB because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S1InterMmeFailDueToApnRestrictionTargetMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-MME Handover procedures over the S1 interface that have failed due to APN restriction in the target MME. The counter is incremented when a Forward Relocation Response message with a failure cause is sent to the source MME because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context of the Forward Relocation Request message received from the source MME are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the target MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2Fail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed X2-based Handover procedures. Trigger: Sending the S1-AP Path Switch Request Failure message to the target eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S10NbrUnblockedTargetMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a blacklisted target MME is removed from the blacklist and is again available for the inter-MME PS handover procedures over the S10 interface during the measurement period.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.X2FailRR.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful X2-based Handover procedures that have failed due to Roaming Restrictions.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S10NbrTempBlockedTargetMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times an unavailable target MME is temporarily blacklisted for the inter-MME PS handover procedure over the S10 interface during the measurement period. The counter is measured on the source MME and increments every time the handover procedure fails to recieve a Forward Relocation Response from a target MME. When this happens the unavailable target MME is temporarily blacklisted and is not selected as a candidate target for the subsequent PS handover procedures for a default duration of 10 minutes (maximum 360 minutes).

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_IRATHO_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_IRATHO_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromUmtsInterDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-SGSN-MME IRAT PS handover procedures from UMTS to LTE, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported by the target MME, but the handover procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.UmtsSuccOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #IRAT# #PS# Handover procedures from #LTE# to #UMTS#. The counter is incremented when the Forward Relocation Complete Notification message arrives at the source #MME# from the target #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.S3NbrUnblockedTargetS4sgsn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a blacklisted target S4-SGSN is removed from the blacklist and is again available for the IRAT PS handover procedures over S3 interface during the measurement period.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.UmtsAttOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #IRAT# #PS# Handover procedures from #LTE# to #UMTS#. The counter is incremented when the Handover Required message arrives at the source #MME# with the Handover Type #IE# set to "LTEtoUTRAN".

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromUmtsFailIntraDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-Node IRAT Handover procedures from UMTS to LTE that have failed due to APN restriction in the MME part of the combined node. The counter is incremented when an Intra-Node IRAT Handover procedure from UMTS to LTE fails because all the APNs in the PDP Context stored for the UE from the 3G SGSN part of the combined node are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME part.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromUmtsFailInterDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-Node IRAT Handover procedures from UMTS to LTE that have failed due to APN restriction in the target MME. The counter is incremented when a Forward Relocation Response message with a failure cause is sent to the source 3G SGSN because all the APNs in the PDP Context of the Forward Relocation Request message received from the source 3G SGSN are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the target MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.S3NbrTempBlockedTargetS4sgsn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times an unavailable target S4-SGSN is blacklisted during IRAT PS handover procedures over the S3 interface during the measurement period. The counter is measured on the source MME and increments every time the handover procedure fails to recieve a Forward Relocation Response from a target S4-SGSN. When this happens the unavailable target S4-SGSN is temporarily blacklisted and is not available as a candidate target for the subsequent PS handover procedures for a default duration of 10 minutes (maximum 360 minutes).

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.UmtsAttInc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #IRAT# #PS# Handover procedures from #UMTS# to #LTE#. The counter is incremented when the Forward Relocation Request message arrives at the target #MME# from the source #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.ToUmtsAttIntra.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-SGSN/MME IRAT handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter increases when the #MME# receives a Handover Required message with RNC Target ID. The counter is measured on the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromUmtsSuccIntra.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful intra-SGSN/MME #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #UMTS# access to #LTE# access. The counter increases when the #MME# receives a Handover Notify message from the eNodeB. The counter is measured on the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromUmtsIntraDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN-MME IRAT PS handover procedures from UMTS to LTE, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported by the target MME, but the handover procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.UmtsSuccInc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #IRAT# #PS# Handover procedures from #UMTS# to #LTE#. The counter is incremented when the Handover Notify message arrives at the target #MME#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_IRATHO_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_IRATHO_G area.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccIntraSGSNUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Intra #IRAT# #PS# Handovers when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#.
Trigger: Reception of #PS# Handover Complete #BSSGP# message from #BSS# when Source CELL is situated under own #SGSN# but under #WCDMA# control.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttInterSGSNNewUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handover attempts in new #SGSN# when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Request #GTP-C# message in #GSM# from source#SGSN# when source CELL is #WCDMA#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccInterSGSNNewUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handovers when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#.
Trigger: Sending of Forward Relocation Complete #GTP-C# message in #GSM# to source#SGSN# #WCDMA#

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccInterSGSNOldGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handovers when moving from #GSM# to #WCDMA#.
Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Complete #GTP-C# message from target#SGSN# #WCDMA# when source#SGSN# is #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttInterSGSNOldGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handover attempts in old #SGSN# #GSM#, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger: Reception of #PS# Handover Required #BSSGP# message from #BSS# when Target CELL is situated under cooperating #WCDMA#-#SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttIntraSGSNGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Intra #SGSN# #IRAT# #PS# Handover from #GSM# to #WCDMA# attempts, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger:Reception of #PS# Handover Required #BSSGP# message from #BSS# when Target CELL is situated under own #SGSN# but under #WCDMA# control.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_IRATHO_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_IRATHO_U area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.LteSuccOut.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful inter-SGSN/MME #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #UMTS# access to #LTE# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Forward Relocation Complete Notification message from the #MME#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccInterSGSNOldUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handovers in old #SGSN# when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#.
Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Complete #GTP-C# message from target#SGSN# #GSM# when source#SGSN# is #WCDMA#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.ToLteAttIntra.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-SGSN/MME #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #UMTS# access to #LTE# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Relocation Required message with eNodeB target ID from the #RNC#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttInterSGSNOldUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handover attempts in old #SGSN# when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger: Reception of Relocation Required #RANAP# message from #RNC# when Target CELL is situated under cooperating #GSM#-#SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccInterSGSNNewGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handovers in new SGSN when moving from #GSM# to #WCDMA#.
Trigger: Sending of Forward Relocation Complete #GTP-C# message in #WCDMA# to source#SGSN# #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.LteAttInc.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of incoming inter-#SGSN#/#MME# #IRAT# #PS# handover requests from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Forward Relocation Request message from the #MME#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#. #Note: The Gn-#SGSN# as target side does not have enough information to decide if the source side is #SGSN# or #MME# during inter node #HO# from #GTPv1# Forward Relocation Request. Therefore, instead of VS.IRATHO.LteAttInc.U, the Gn-#SGSN# uses RELOC.AttInterSGSNNew for all inter #HO# from #SGSN# or #MME#.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.FromLteSuccIntra.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful intra-SGSN/MME #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Relocation Complete message from the #RNC#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.LteSuccInc.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful incoming inter-#SGSN#/#MME# #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Relocation Complete message from the #RNC#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#. #Note: The Gn-#SGSN# as target side does not have enough information to decide if the source side is #SGSN# or #MME# during inter node #HO# from #GTPv1# Forward Relocation Request. Therefore, instead of VS.IRATHO.LteSuccInc.U, the Gn-#SGSN# uses RELOC.SuccInterSGSNNew for all inter #HO# from #SGSN# or #MME#.Note#

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttInterSGSNNewGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Inter #IRAT# #PS# Handover attempts in new #SGSN# #WCDMA#, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger: Reception of Forward Relocation Request #GTP-C# message in #WCDMA# from source#SGSN# when source CELL is #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.AttIntraSGSNUmtsGsm
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of Intra #IRAT# #PS# Handover attempts when moving from #WCDMA# to #GSM#, including possible retransmissions.
Trigger: Reception of Relocation Required #RANAP# message from #RNC# when Target CELL is situated under own #SGSN# but under #GSM# control.

EntityDef.name: IRATHO.SuccIntraSGSNGsmUmts
EntityDef.description:
Counts the number of successful Intra #IRAT# #PS# Handovers when moving from #GSM# to #WCDMA#.
Trigger: Reception of Relocation Complete #RANAP# message from #RNC# when Source CELL is situated under own #SGSN# but under #GSM# control.

EntityDef.name: VS.IRATHO.LteAttOut.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-SGSN/MME #IRAT# #PS# handover procedures from #UMTS# access to #LTE# access. The counter increases when the #SGSN# receives a Relocation Required message with eNodeB target ID from the #RNC#. The counter is measured on the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_ISYSC_E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-Node TAU Inter-System Change from SGSN procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME part of the combined node. The counter is incremented when a TAU Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the PDP Context stored for the UE from the SGSN part of the combined node are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME part.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.IntraTauRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-Node TAU Inter-System Change from SGSN procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME part of the combined node. The counter is incremented when a TAU Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the PDP Context stored for the UE from the SGSN part of the combined node are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME part.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.InterTAUNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to the Inter-SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU Request with Inter System Change due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterDecorRerouteOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of failed inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures from #SGSN-MME# procedures (with #RAT# change). Failed TAU, both from #Gn-SGSN# and from #S4-SGSN#, are counted. Both sent and resent messages from the #UE# are counted.
This will count inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.13.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraDecorRerouteIn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the MME receives a rerouted Initial UE Message with MMEGI from another DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.InterTAUIpmrRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful ISC SGSN-MME TAU procedures that are caused by the Inter-PLMN Mobility Restriction function.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #TAU# from both #GnSGSN# and #S4-SGSN# procedures.The counter is incremented when the #TAU# Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures from #SGSN# procedures (with #RAT# change). Both sent and resent messages from the #UE# are counted. This will count intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures both from #Gn-SGSN# and from #S4-SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.13.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.InterTauRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-Node TAU Inter-System Change from SGSN procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the new MME. The counter is incremented when a TAU Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the PDP Context of the SGSN Context Response message received from the old SGSN are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the new MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.EmcInterTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU with emergency indication that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU with emergency indication is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.9.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #9, "UE identity cannot be derived by the network".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.11.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #11, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.InterTAUUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterSuccWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful inter-node ISC TAU procedures, after which the UE is in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.IntraTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterS3Succ.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed inter-node #ISC# #TAU# from #S4-SGSN# procedures (with #RAT# change).The counter is incremented when the #TAU# Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.12.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #12, "Tracking area not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched, but the TAU procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed intra-node #ISC# #TAU# from #SGSN# procedures (with #RAT# change). The counter is incremented when a #TAU# Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#. This will count successful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# from both #Gn-SGSN# and from #S4-SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.14.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #14, "EPS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterDecorReject.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC that are rejected because the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched in the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched, but the TAU procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraDecorRerouteOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterDecorRerouteIn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC, where the MME receives a rerouted Initial UE Message with MMEGI from another DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.11.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #11, "PLMN not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.15.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #15, "No suitable cells in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFail.15.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #15, "No suitable cells in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #TAU# from both #GnSGSN# and from #S4-SGSN# procedures. Both sent and resent messages from #UE# are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.IntraTAUNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to the Intra-SGSN-MME TAU Request with Inter System Change due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraDecorReject.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN-MME TAU with ISC that are rejected because the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched in the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterS3Att.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-node #ISC# #TAU# from #S4-SGSN# procedures (with #RAT# change). Both sent and resent messages from the #UE# are counted. If the MME can not find any #S4-SGSN#s, it is impossible to determine which type of #SGSN# made the attempt. Therefore attempts that fail because the #MME# is unable to find an #SGSN#, are not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.40.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #40, "No EPS bearer context activated".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauInterFailNoCtxt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed #TAU# from #Gn-SGSN# and #S4-SGSN# procedures due to the old #SGSN# not sending #PDP# context or #PDN# connections respectively.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.EmcIntraTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU with emergency indication that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU with emergency indication is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.14.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #14, "EPS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraFail.12.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-node #ISC# #TAU# procedures (with #RAT# change) that have failed with cause code #12, "Tracking area not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.IntraTAUUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Intra SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.TauIntraSuccWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful intra-node ISC TAU procedures, after which the UE is in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.InterTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Inter SGSN-MME Inter-System Change TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_ISYSC
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_ISYSC area.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.RauUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: The number of Inter-SGSN Inter-System Change RAU messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Inter-SGSN RAU message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: ISYSC.UnsuccIntraSgsnGsmUmtsRauCSPSCoord
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN inter-system change procedures being rejected due to the coordination of #CS# and #PS# in a MOCN constellation.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.RauUscRejected.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Routing Area Update Request messages of Inter-SGSN RAU Inter-System Change that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Routing Area Update Request message of Inter-SGSN RAU Inter-System Change is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.ISYSC.RauUscDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: The number of Inter-SGSN Inter-System Change RAU messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Inter-SGSN RAU message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: ISYSC.UnsuccIntraSgsnUmtsGsmRauCSPSCoord
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-SGSN ISC procedures being rejected due to the coordination of CS and PS in a MOCN constellation.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_RA
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_RA area.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrActAttachedSubUsimRa
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers using USIM per RA within an SGSN. It includes the attached USIM users with GSM access and UMTS access. This gauge is incremented when a USIM subscriber is attached and decremented when it is detached. For an RA Update, the old RA indexed gauge is decremented and the new RA indexed gauge is incremented.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.19.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 19 (ESM failure).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdateLocationAnsFail.5004
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Update Location procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5004. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Update Location Answer message with cause code 5004 (Roaming not allowed).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SmsPagingSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful paging procedures initiated due to #MT# #SMS#, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or resending of the paging request. This counter is incremented each time a paging procedure, due to #SMS#, is successfully concluded.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ControlPlaneServiceRequestAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Control Plane Service Request procedures. It is incremented when an S1 Control Plane Service Request message is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauPeriodicAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Periodic TAU procedures initiated within this MME area. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ImeisvChange.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of events that the IMEISV of a UE changes. The counter is incremented when the MME detects IMEISV change of a UE, either by Security Mode Command or by Identity Request messages. The counter is not incremented when the MME gets the IMEISV of a UE at the first time.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeInterSgwTauAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-MME TAU procedures with SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives a Context Response message and the DNS query is successful. It is also increased whenever the new MME receives a TAU Request message after the Inter-MME S1-Based Handover procedure with SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.12.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures that have failed with cause code #12, "Tracking area not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.NbrActAttachedSub.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs that are NB-IoT devices and leave or enter the AP within an MME area with RAT type NB. The gauge is incremented when the UE enters the state emm_registered, for example, because of Attach, Inter-MME TA Update, Detach, or Implicit Detach. The gauge is decremented when the UE leaves the state emm_registered. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraTAUUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Intra-MME TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Intra-MME TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1ReleaseMBRTimeout
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of MME-initiated S1 Release procedures that are triggered due to timeout in waiting for the Modify Bearer Response message in the following procedures: - Service Request. - Control Plane Service Request. - S1/S11 bearer setup following a TAU procedure (for example, TAU with active flag or signaling active flag). - Connection Resume procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachConnectionSuspendAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Attach procedures for which the UE has requested to use the Connection Suspend and Resume feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsgAccessFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed attempts by UE to access CSG cells due to CSG restrictions.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedEmc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of currently attached #UE# within this #MME# area for #IMS# Emergency Service only. The gauge will be incremented or decremented when the #UE# enters or leaves the #MME# with only #IMS# Emergency Service, for example, due to Attach, Inter-#MME# mobility, Detach or Implicit Detach. This gauge will also be increased if an attached user with an additional EMC PDN looses its non-emergency PDNs due to, for example, Roaming restrictions, and then ends up with only IMS Emergency Service.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachEmcSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #E-UTRAN# attach procedures initiated within this #MME# area, with emergency indication. This counter is incremented when the MME receives an Attach Complete message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PsPagingRestartBasedOnArpAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted PS Paging procedures that meet the following conditions: - The PS Paging procedure is triggered by a DDN message. - The MME restarts the PS Paging procedure by aborting the ongoing PS Paging procedure. The counter is incremented at the restart of the Paging procedure. Note: This counter is applicable only when MPS-classified ARP level is not configured.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttAttach.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #E-UTRAN# attach procedures initiated within the MME's area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.14.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures that have failed with a cause code #14, "#EPS# Services not allowed in this #PLMN#".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeTauDecorRerouteIn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-MME TAU procedures, where the MME receives a rerouted Initial UE Message with MMEGI from another DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TaLaMisconfigurationMscSupervision
VS.MM.PagingAvoidedDueToUeInPsm.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of paging procedures in #EPS# that have been avoided due to the #UE# being in Power Saving Mode (PSM). The counter is increased when paging is needed, but cannot be performed since the #UE# is in PSM and unreachable.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.17.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that have failed with a cause code #17, "Network failure".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsOnlyToGAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted SRVCC CS Only procedures to GSM in the MME. It is incremented when a Handover Required message with the SRVCC HO Indication IE indicating "CS only" is received from the eNodeB over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraFail.15.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-#MME#, intra-#RAT# #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #15, "No suitable cells in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachThrottlingNonReservedGrantedAttach.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of E-UTRAN attach procedures that have been accepted by the Attach throttle using the non-reserved allowance. The non-reserved allowance is the difference between the total Attach throttle allowance, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingAttachRateLimit parameter, and the sum of the reserved allowances, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitAttach and MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitGeoredRestore parameters. E-UTRAN attach procedures accepted using the reserved Attach allowance specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitAttach parameter are not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1Release
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 releases in the #MME#. Both eNodeB and MME initiated releases are counted. Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the #eNodeB#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterTAUUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Inter-MME TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Inter-MME TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccAttach.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #E-UTRAN# attach procedures initiated within this #MME# area. This counter is incremented when the MME receives an Attach Complete message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ExtendedServiceReqFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Extended Service Request procedures for 1xCS fallback to 1xRTT in the #MME#. It is incremented when a Service Reject message is sent in response to an Extended Service Request.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportMtlr.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report messages received by the #MME# from the eNodeB during Mobile Terminated Location Request procedures. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives a Location Report message from the eNodeB during a Mobile Terminated Location Request procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsfbPagingSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful paging procedures initiated due to #MT# call, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or resending of the paging request. This counter is incremented each time a paging procedure, due to #CS# fallback, is successfully concluded.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.6.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Inter-MME TAU procedures over the S10 interface due to cause code 6. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives a TAU Reject message with cause code 6 (Illegal ME).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttDetachMme
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MME#-initiated #EPS# detach requests, node total. It is incremented each time a detach request is sent from the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.15.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures that have failed with cause code #15, "No suitable cells in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeTauDecorRerouteOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-MME TAU procedures, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach request procedures, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched, but the attach procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrHomeSub.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #EPS# home subscribers located in the MME location register. The #EMM# state of this subscriber is EMM_REGISTERED or EMM_DEREGISTERED. Only #EPS# subscribers that are homed in the same #EPS# network are considered.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraFail.13.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-#MME#, intra-#RAT# #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UnsuccServiceReq.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S1 Service Request procedures in the MME. This counter is increased whenever an Service Reject message is sent except for being sent by the reject action of UE Signaling Control.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDecorRerouteIn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach request procedures, where the MME receives a rerouted Initial UE Message with MMEGI from another DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttLastVisitedTaPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement gives the total number of attempted paging procedures based on last visited #TA#. The counter is incremented when a Paging Request is sent to the last #TA#. That is at the transmission of the first paging message in a paging selection of LastVisitedTA within a paging profile. Retransmission of Paging Request based on last visited #TA# is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UnsuccAttachCC27_28.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# Attach procedures per #MME# because of cause code 27 (Unknown or missing #APN#) and cause code 28 (Unknown #PDN# address or #PDN# type). The counter is incremented in the following scenarios: - The #MME# receives a Create Session Response message with cause code 78 (Missing or unknown #APN#) from the #SGW#. - The #MME# interrogates the #DNS# resolver and there is a failure, such as name error or undefined default #APN# of the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeInterSgwTauAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-MME TAU procedures with SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever the Security Function is completed and the DNS query is successful. It is also increased whenever the MME receives a TAU Request message after the Intra-MME X2-Based or S1-Based Handover procedure with SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccLastVisitedTaPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on LastVisistedTa, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrAttachedNrCapable.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached #NR# capable #UEs#. The gauge is incremented when an #NR# capable #UE# enters the #MME#. The gauge is decremented when an #NR# capable #UE# leaves the #MME#.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UnsuccAttachCC32_33.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures per #MME# due to cause code 32 (Service option not supported), and cause code 33 (Requested Service Option not subscribed). The counter is incremented if the #PDN# Type is not supported or if the request is denied in the #MME# due to subscriber data restriction.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeIntraSgwTauSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-MME TAU procedures without SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever a normal Intra-MME TAU procedure without SGW relocation is completed. It is also increased whenever the Intra-MME TAU is performed successfully after the Intra-MME X2-Based or S1-Based Handover procedure without SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUpByConfigWhenUeReqCp.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach Procedures with the SGi IP PDN connection established over user plane because the MME local policy permits user plane for the UE supporting the control plane CIoT EPS optimization and S1-U data transfer while the UE prefers control plane CIoT EPS optimization.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttEnodebListPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of paging procedures based on the latest visited eNodeB list. The counter is incremented when a Paging Request message is sent to eNodeBs in the latest visited eNodeB list. That is at the transmission of the first paging message in a paging selection of LatestVisitedENodeBList within a paging profile. Retransmission of a Paging Request message based on the latest visited eNodeB list is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttTaListPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement gives the total number of attempted paging procedures based on whole #TAI# list a #UE# has registered. The counter is incremented when a Paging Request is sent to the whole #TAI# list. That is, at the transmission of the first paging message in a paging selection of #TAI# list within a paging profile. Retransmission of Paging Request based on #TAI# list is not counted. Note: Paging procedures triggered by NTSR or CSSR are not counted in this counter. Paging procedures triggered by NTSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForNTSR.E. Paging procedures triggered by CSSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForCSSR.E.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedSub.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached #EPS# subscribers within this #MME# area. The gauge will be incremented or decremented when the #UE# enters or leaves the #MME#, for example, due to Attach, Inter-#MME# #TA# Update, Detach or Implicit Detach.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ConnectionResumeFailureDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Resume procedures that have failed due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when an S1-AP UE Context Resume Failure message is sent to the eNodeB or an X2-based Handover procedure with RRC Cause Resume is rejected or aborted because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrSubSupportEmmRegisteredWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs supporting EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection. The gauge is incremented when the UE supporting EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection changes into the EMM-REGISTERED state, because of, for example, Attach or Inter-MME TAU procedures. The gauge is decremented when the UE supporting EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection changes into the EMM-DEREGISTERED state leaves the EMM-REGISTERED state, because of, for example, Detach or Implicit Detach or Inter-MME mobility procedures.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeTauDecorReject.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-MME TAU procedures that are rejected because the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched in the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsAndPsToWCsSuccPsFailed.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SRVCC CS and PS procedures from LTE to WCDMA where the CS part is successful but the PS part fails. This counter is incremented when a PS to CS Complete Notification is received from MSC and a Forward Relocation Response or Forward Relocation Complete Notification either times out or is received with cause code indicating failure reported by the SGSN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraAtt.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated within this #MME# area. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.
All types of intra-MME #TAU# requests are counted, that is, both Intra-MME #TAU# and Periodic #TAU#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PsPagingBypassQuarantineTimerSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful PS Paging procedures that meet the following conditions, irrespective of the paging being an initial Paging message or the resending of the Paging message: - The PS Paging procedure is triggered by a DDN message. - The MME starts the PS Paging procedure by bypassing the paging quarantine timer. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from the UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachWithESMDummyAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Attach procedures with an ESM dummy message contained in the ESM message container IE in the Attach Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Attach Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.14.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-MME #TAU# procedures that have failed with a cause code #14, "EPS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.RepeatPagingTimerStartedFirst.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed paging procedures that start a quarantine timer for the first time in a quarantine sequence.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeTauDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-MME TAU procedures, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched, but the TAU procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ControlPlaneServiceRequestFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessfulControl Plane Service Request procedures. It is incremented when an S1 Service Reject message is sent in response to a Control Plane Service Request.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.6.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed attach procedures per #MME# due to a blocked #ME#. It is incremented when the #MME# returns an Attach Reject message to the #UE# with cause code #6, Illegal #ME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EmcIntraTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of intra-MME Tracking Area Update Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsfbPagingAtt.E
