EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #CS# fallback paging procedures due to #MT# call, initiated at the #MME# over the S1-MME interface. The counter is incremented when a #CS# fallback paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current S-TMSI. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new #MT# call from an #MSC/VLR# is regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDoNasAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Attach procedures, where the UE has requested to use the 'Data over NAS' feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachConnectionSuspendSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach procedures for which the UE is granted use of the Connection Suspend and Resume feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ExtendedServiceReqAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Extended Service Request procedures for 1xCS fallback to 1xRTT in the #MME#. It is incremented when an Extended Service Request is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeTauDecorAcceptUnsuppUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-MME TAU procedures, where the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched, but the TAU procedure is handled by the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraFail.12.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-#MME#, intra-#RAT# #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #12, "Tracking area not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDoNasSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach Procedures, where the UE is granted use of the 'Data over NAS' feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccDetachMme
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #MME#-initiated #EPS# detach requests, node total. It is incremented when the #MME# receives an expected detach accept.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.5.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 5 (IMEI not accepted).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterTauRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Inter-MME TAU procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the new MME. The counter is incremented when a TAU Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context of the Context Response message received from the old MME are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the new MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UnsuccAttach.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #E-UTRAN# attach requests per MME This counter is increased whenever an Attach Reject message is sent except for being sent by the reject action of UE Signaling Control.
Note: The number of successful attempts subtracted from the total number of attempts does not equal the number of unsuccessful attempts due to discarded messages, resent messages, and messages controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PsPagingRestartBasedOnArpSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful PS Paging procedures that meet the following conditions, irrespective of the paging being an initial Paging message or the resending of the Paging message: - The PS Paging procedure is triggered by a DDN message. - The MME restarts the PS Paging procedure by aborting the ongoing PS Paging procedure. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from the UE is received. Note: This counter is applicable only when MPS-classified ARP level is not configured.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EmcServiceReqUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedSubConnectionSuspend.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs granted use of the Connection Suspend and Resume feature. The gauge is incremented when a UE granted use of the Connection Suspend and Resume feature attaches to or moves into the MME. The gauge is decremented when a UE granted use of the Connection Suspend and Resume feature detaches from or moves out of the MME.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1ReleasePreEmption
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of eNodeB-initiated S1 releases due to cause "Release due to Pre-Emption".
Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the #eNodeB#, after receiving a UE Context Release Request or Handover Cancel from the eNodeB with cause "Release due to Pre-Emption".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReport.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report messages received in the #MME# from the eNodeB. Note: The counter can be used in the Cell Change Reporting feature, Mobility-Based Policy feature, and Presence Reporting Area Support feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdateLocationAnsFail.5421
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Update Location procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5421. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Update Location Answer message with cause code 5421 (RAT not allowed).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttServiceRequest.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S1 Service request procedures in the MME. It is incremented when an S1 Service Request is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeTauDecorRerouteOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-MME TAU procedures, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachSuccWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach procedures, after which the attached UE is in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachCpByConfigWhenUeReqUp.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach Procedures with the SGi IP PDN connection established over control plane because the MME local policy permits control plane for the UE supporting the control plane CIoT EPS optimization and S1-U data transfer while the UE prefers user plane CIoT EPS optimization.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceRequestRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Service Request procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a Service Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrCsAttachedSub.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the current number of SGs associated subscribers within this #MME#. The gauge is incremented at each successful initial registration for a #UE# towards an #MSC/VLR#. The gauge is decremented each time a #UE# is #IMSI# detached.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.8.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Inter-MME TAU procedures over the S10 interface due to cause code 8. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives a TAU Reject message with cause code 8 (Not authorized EPS and non-EPS service).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.11.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures that have failed with cause code #11, "#PLMN# not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdateLocationAnsFail.5001
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Update Location Answer procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5001. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Update Location Answer message with cause code 5001 (User unknown).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedEmcUnauth.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of currently unauthenticated attached UEs within this MME area for IMS emergency service only. The gauge will be incremented or decremented when an unauthenticated UE enters or leaves the MME with only IMS Emergency Service, for example, due to Attach, Inter-MME mobility, Detach or Implicit Detach.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttDetachDueToPgwResel.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times of detaching UE triggered by the MME due to PGW reselection.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ExtServiceReqUscDetached.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Extended Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Extended Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Attach Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PagingAvoidedInGeoDueToUeInEdrx.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of paging procedures in #EPS# that have been avoided due to the #UE# being in eDRX during UE restoration upon the DDN with IMSI procedure in Geographically redundant pool. The counter is increased when paging is needed, but cannot be performed since the #UE# is in eDRX and not in paging time window after the MME receives a DDN message from the SGW. This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccLastVisitedEnodebPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on LastVisitedENodeB, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.8.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with a cause code #8, "EPS Services and non EPS Services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeIntraSgwTauAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-MME TAU procedures without SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever the Security Function is completed and the DNS query is successful. It is also increased whenever the MME receives a TAU Request message after the Intra-MME X2-Based or S1-Based Handover procedure without SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedSubDoNas.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs using the 'Data over NAS' feature. The gauge is incremented when a UE using the 'Data over NAS' feature attaches to or moves into the MME. The gauge is decremented when a UE using the 'Data over NAS' feature detaches from or moves out of the MME.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraTAUUscDetached.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of TAU Request messages of Intra-MME TAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a TAU Request message of Intra-MME TAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeInterSgwTauSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter-MME TAU procedures with SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever a normal Inter-MME TAU with SGW Relocation procedure is completed. It is also increased whenever the TAU is performed successfully after the Inter-MME S1-Based Handover procedure with SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ConnectionSuspend.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Suspend procedures. The counter is incremented when an S1-AP UE Context Suspend Request message is received from the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationUpdateAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Location Update procedures towards an #MSC/VLR#, initiated within the #MME#. This counter is incremented each time a Location Update procedure is started towards an #MSC/VLR#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraMmeInterSgwTauSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-MME TAU procedures with SGW relocation.The counter is increased whenever a normal Intra-MME TAU procedure with SGW relocation is completed. It is also increased whenever the Intra-MME TAU is performed successfully after the Intra-MME X2-Based or S1-Based Handover procedure with SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeTauDecorRerouteIn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-MME TAU procedures, where the MME receives a rerouted Initial UE Message with MMEGI from another DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccFirstPsPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of #PS# paging procedures that are successful at the first paging message in the paging procedure. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeIntraSgwTauAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-MME TAU procedures without SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever the new MME receives a Context Response message and the DNS query is successful. It is also increased whenever the new MME receives a TAU Request message after the Inter-MME S1-Based Handover procedure without SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.15.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-MME #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #15, "No suitable cells in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PsPagingBypassQuarantineTimerAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted PS Paging procedures that meet the following conditions: - The PS Paging procedure is triggered by a DDN message. - The MME starts the PS Paging procedure by bypassing the paging quarantine timer. The counter is incremented when a Paging message is sent to the eNodeB at the first transmission.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EmcInterTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of inter-MME Tracking Area Update Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1ReleaseStopHoRetryAttempts
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of S1 releases initiated by the #MME# to prevent the source #eNodeB# from making repeated handover retry attempts in some extreme situations.
The measurement is now used for the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature only.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportFailureChangeOfServiceCell.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Location Reporting procedures initiated by the MME due to the change of a service cell. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives a Location Report Failure Indication message during Location Reporting procedure for the "Change of Service Cell" request type. Note: The counter can be used in the Cell Change Reporting feature, Mobility-Based Policy feature, and Presence Reporting Area Support feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDecorRerouteOut.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach request procedures, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachLapiRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Attach Requests from the low access priority UE when the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control is activated.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraFail.11.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-#MME#, intra-#RAT# #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #11, "PLMN not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportControlMtlr.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Reporting Control messages sent by the #MME# to the eNodeB during Mobile Terminated Location Request procedures.This counter is incremented each time the MME sends a Location Reporting Control message to the eNodeB during a Mobile Terminated Location Request procedure. Note: If another procedure has already sent the Location Reporting Control message to the eNodeB, the MME saves signaling by not re-sending the message. But this counter is still incremented in this case.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterTAUNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Inter-TAU Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Inter-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#. The counter is incremented when the Tracking Area Update Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachWithESMDummySucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Attach procedures with an ESM dummy message contained in the ESM message container IE in the Attach Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1ReleaseUserInactivity
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of eNodeB-initiated S1 releases due to cause "User Inactivity".
Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the #eNodeB#, after receiving a UE Context Release Request from the eNodeB with cause "User Inactivity".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1PagingMessages
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of paging messages sent by the #SGSN-MME# over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when a paging message is sent by the #SGSN-MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrAttachedNr.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached #NR# capable and not #NR# restricted #UEs#. The gauge is incremented when an #NR# capable and not #NR# restricted #UE# enters the #MME#. The gauge is decremented when an #NR# capable and not #NR# restricted #UE# leaves the #MME#.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.12.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-MME #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #12, "Tracking area not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsfbToWGAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #CS# fallback procedures to #WCDMA# or #GSM#, in the #MME#. It is incremented either when an extended service request for a Mobile Originated #MO# call is received from the #UE# or when a paging request for an #MT# call is received from the #MSC/VLR# over the SGs interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterSuccWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter-MME TAU procedures, after which the UE is in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SmsPagingAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MT# #SMS# paging procedures due to #MT# #SMS#, initiated at the #MME# over the S1-MME interface. The counter is incremented when an #SMS# paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current #S-TMSI#. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new #MT# #SMS# from an #MSC/VLR# is regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachLapiAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Attach Requests sent from the low access priority UE to the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NBPagingSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures initiated for UEs in Tracking Areas with RAT type NB-IoT. This measurement is incremented irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Control Plane Service Request message, or any NAS message, is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrSubEmmRegisteredWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection. The gauge is incremented when the UE changes into the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection, because of, for example, Attach, Inter-MME TAU procedures without PDN connection, or deactivation of the last PDN connection. The gauge is decremented when the UE leaves the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection, because of, for example, Detach or Inter-MME mobility procedures or Implicit Detach, or activation of the first PDN connection for the UE in EMM-REGISTERED.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ControlPlaneServiceReqNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Control Plane Service Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MoCsfbAttInNoCsServiceArea.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of MO CS call attempts when the CombinedRegistrationSetting parameter is set to dummy_cs_service and the #UE# is in no CSFB service area. This counter is incremented each time an MO CS call is rejected because of no CSFB service area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ConnectionResume.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Connection Resume procedures. The counter is incremented when an S1-AP UE Context Resume Request message or an S1-AP Path Switch Request with RRC Cause Resume is received from the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Inter-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#. The counter is incremented when the Tracking Area Update Reject message is transmitted to the #UE#.
#Note: The number of successful attempts substracted from the total number of attempts does not equal the number of unsuccessful procedures due to discarded and resent messages. Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.13.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# attach procedures that have failed with cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttImsiDetachMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted MME-initiated IMSI detach procedures. This counter is incremented each time the MME sends an IMSI detach request to the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrSmsInMmeRegisteredSub.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of registered subscribers for which the MME has successfully performed the SMS in MME registration.
The gauge is incremented in one of the following scenarios: - When a new subscriber registers on the MME, the MME successfully performs the SMS in MME registration for the subscriber. - A subscriber has already registered on the MME without the SMS in MME registration. Later, in the mobility procedure the MME successfully performs the SMS in MME registration for the subscriber, for example, when the UE requests SMS service and/or the configuration changes. - A subscriber reattaches to the MME after a proper detach, and the MME had successfully performed the SMS in MME registration for the subscriber in the previous registration.
The gauge is decremented in one of the following scenarios: - The MME sends a Notify Request message with the Removal of MME Registration for SMS bit set in the NOR-Flags AVP, to the HSS. - The MME receives an Insert Subscriber Data Request message with the Remove SMS Registration bit set in the IDR-Flags AVP, from the HSS. - A subscriber moves to another SGSN-MME. - A subscriber is detached.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.9.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Inter-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME# which resulted in cause code #9, "UE identity cannot be derived by the network".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ExtServiceReqUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Extended Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Extended Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated within this #MME# area. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrEcmConnectedSub.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of subscribers in the ECM-CONNECTED state.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.RepeatPagingTimerExpired.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed paging procedures with expired quarantine timer. The counter is incremented when the quarantine timer expires before receiving any Initial UE Message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrVisitingNatSub.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of national roaming subscribers in the #MME#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is one of the #MCC#s of the #PLMN#s supported by the #MME#. The #EPS# #MM# state of these subscribers is EMM_REGISTERED or EMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with the same #MCC#s but different #MNC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #TAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraFail.14.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful intra-#MME#, intra-#RAT# #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #14, "EPS services not allowed in tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsAndPsToWSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful SRVCC CS and PS procedures from LTE to WCDMA. It is incremented when both an SRVCC PS to CS Complete Notification message from the MSC and a Forward Relocation Complete Notification from the SGSN is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of intra-MME Tracking Area Update Request messages discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccTaListPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on TaList, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraTAUNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Intra-TAU Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttDetachUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #UE#-initiated #E-UTRAN# detach procedures within this #MME# area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachEmcAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #E-UTRAN# attach procedures initiated within this #MME# area, with emergency indication.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EmcAttachUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachRejectDueToAttachThrottling.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of E-UTRAN attach procedures that have been rejected due to the Attach Throttling function. The counter is incremented when an Attach procedure is rejected because the available allowance has been exceeded. The available allowance for E-UTRAN attach procedures is the difference between the total Attach throttle allowance, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingAttachRateLimit parameter and the reserved allowance for Geographically Redundant UE Restoration Procedures specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitGeoredRestore parameter.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationUpdateSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Location Update procedures towards an #MSC/VLR#, initiated within the #MME#. This counter is incremented each time a Location Update procedure is successfully concluded towards an #MSC/VLR#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PublicWarningSystemDiscardedPagingMessage.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of S1-AP paging messages discarded during sending of the PWS-related signaling when the DiscardPagingDuringPWS parameter is set to true.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.S1ReleaseRadioConnectionLost
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of eNodeB-initiated S1 releases due to cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost".
Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the #eNodeB#, after receiving a UE Context Release Request or Handover Cancel from the eNodeB with cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraTauRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-MME TAU with Active Flag or Signalling Active Flag procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a TAU Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttLastVisitedEnodebPaging.E
EntityDef.description: The counter is incremented when a Paging Request is sent to the eNodeB a #UE# has visited. That is at the transmission of the first paging message attempt in a paging selection of LastVisitedENodeB within a paging profile. Retransmission of Paging Request based on last visited eNodeB is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsgAccessAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempts by UE to access CSG cells.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedSubLapi.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached UEs that are configured for low access priority. The gauge is incremented or decremented when the low access priority UE enters or leaves the MME, for example, due to Attach, Inter-MME TA Update, Detach or Implicit Detach.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 80% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 75% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.11.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-MME #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #11, "PLMN not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqLapiAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Service Requests sent from the low access priority UE to the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EpsAttachFail.7.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with a cause code #7, "EPS Services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauPeriodicSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Periodic TAU procedures initiated within this MME area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqNasCongestionControlRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Service Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.EmcExtServiceReqUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Extended Service Request messages with emergency indication that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the ignore action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Extended Service Request message with emergency indication is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the ignore action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportControlChangeOfServiceCell.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Reporting procedures initiated by the MME due to the change of a service cell. This counter is incremented each time the MME sends a Location Reporting Control or Handover Request message with the "Change of Service Cell" request type. Note: The counter can be used in the Cell Change Reporting feature, Mobility-Based Policy feature, and Presence Reporting Area Support feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsOnlyToWAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted SRVCC CS Only procedures to WCDMA in the MME. It is incremented when a Handover Required message with the SRVCC HO Indication IE indicating 'CS only' is received from the eNodeB over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraSuccWithoutPDN.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-MME TAU procedures, after which the UE is in the EMM-REGISTERED state without PDN connection.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsAndPsToWAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted SRVCC CS and PS procedures from LTE to WCDMA. It is incremented when a Handover Required message with the SRVCC HO Indication IE indicating "CS and PS" is received from the eNodeB.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrVisitingForeign.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of international roaming subscribers in the #MME#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is not part of the #PLMN#s supported by the #MME#. The #EPS# #MM# state of these subscribers is EMM_REGISTERED or EMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with different #MCC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #TAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccPsPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful #PS# paging procedures, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any NAS message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrActAttachedSubCatM1.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs that are Cat-M1 and leave or enter the #AP# within an #MME# area. The gauge is incremented when the UE enters the state emm_registered and the #UE# is a Cat-M1 device, or when the #UE# is in the emm_registered state and the #MME# identifies the #UE# as a Cat-M1 device. The #MME# identifies a #UE# as a Cat-M1 device when it receives a UE CAPABILITY INFO INDICATION message indicating that the #UE# is a Cat-M1 device. The transmission of the UE CAPABILITY INFO INDICATION message is triggered by, for example, Attach, Handover, or Service Request.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttPsPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted #PS# paging procedures initiated at the #MME# over the #S1-MME# interface. The counter is incremented when a #PS# paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current #S-TMSI#. Optionally, the paging procedure is followed by paging messages with the old #S-TMSI#. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new Downlink Data Indication from the Serving Gateway is regarded as a new procedure. Note: Paging procedures triggered by NTSR or CSSR are not counted in this counter. Paging procedures triggered by NTSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForNTSR.E. Paging procedures triggered by CSSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForCSSR.E.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportFailureMtlr.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report Failure Indication messages received by the #MME# from the eNodeB during Mobile Terminated Location Request procedures. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives a Location Report Failure Indication message from the eNodeB during a Mobile Terminated Location Request procedure. Note: If this measurement is not equal to the value of VS.MM.LocationReportMtlr.E subtracted from VS.MM.LocationReportControlMtlr.E, that is because no response is received from the eNodeB or for some other reasons.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ExtServiceReqUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Extended Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Extended Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NBPagingAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted Paging procedures initiated for UEs in Tracking Areas with RAT type NB-IoT. The counter is incremented when a Paging message is sent to the eNodeB at the first transmission. Retransmissions of the same Paging message are not counted. Note: Paging procedures triggered by NTSR or CSSR are not counted in this counter. Paging procedures triggered by NTSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForNTSR.E. Paging procedures triggered by CSSR are counted in VS.GeoRed.AttPagingForCSSR.E.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachDecorReject.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach request procedures that are rejected because the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched in the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrAttachedPsm.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #UEs# currently in Power Saving Mode (PSM). The gauge is incremented when a #UE# enters PSM, that is when the active timer expires and the implicit detach timer is started. The gauge is decremented when a #UE# leaves PSM, that is when any kind of signaling from the #UE# is received or when the #UE# is implicitly detached.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: Value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: Value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauIntraSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Periodic and Intra-#MME# #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttDetachHssPcscfInit.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of the Detach attempts, triggered by an Insert Subscriber Data Request message where the P-CSCF Restoration Request bit is set.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterTAUIpmrRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Inter-MME TAU procedures that are caused by the Inter-PLMN Mobility Restriction function.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterTAUUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of inter-MME Tracking Area Update Request messages discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqUscDetached.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CsfbToWGSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #CS# fallback procedures to #WCDMA# or #GSM#, in the #MME#. It is incremented each time a #CS# fallback procedure is successfully concluded, at the reception of a #UE# context release complete message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeTauDecorReject.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-MME TAU procedures that are rejected because the UE Usage Type is not locally supported or MMEGI is mismatched in the current DCN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceReqLapiRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Service Requests from the low access priority UE when the NAS Level Mobility Mangement Congestion Control is activated.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TauInterFail.13.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful inter-MME #TAU# procedures that have failed with cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this tracking area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdateLocationAnsFail.5420
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Update Location procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5420. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Update Location Answer message with cause code 5420 (Unknown EPS subscription).

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsOnlyToGSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful SRVCC CS only procedures to GSM in the MME. It is incremented each time an SRVCC CS only procedure is successfully concluded, at the reception of an SRVCC PS to CS Complete Notification message from the MSC server over the Sv interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Attach procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when an Attach Reject combined with a PDN Connectivity Reject message is sent to the UE because the resolved APN is restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ConnectionResumeFailure.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Connection Resume procedures. The counter is incremented when an S1-AP UE Context Resume Failure message is sent in response to an S1-AP UE Context Resume Request message. It is also incremented when an X2-based Handover procedure with RRC Cause Resume is rejected or aborted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrDisconnectedeNodeB.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently disconnected eNodeBs.
#Note: The Default alarm-triggering level and the Default alarm-clearing level for this gauge is updated according to the latest configured MaxEnodeBUnreachableAlarms value after a small restart.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.CpsrRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Control Plane Service Request procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a Service Reject message is sent to the UE because all the APNs in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MoSMSAttInNoCsServiceArea.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of MO SMS attempts when the CombinedRegistrationSetting parameter is set to dummy_cs_service and the #UE# is in no CS service area. This counter is incremented each time an MO SMS is ignored because of no CS service area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterMmeIntraSgwTauSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter-MME TAU procedures without SGW relocation. The counter is increased whenever a normal Inter-MME TAU procedure without SGW relocation is completed. It is also increased whenever the Inter-MME TAU is performed successfully after the Inter-MME S1-Based Handover procedure without SGW relocation is performed.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.RepeatPagingTimerStarted.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed paging procedures that start a quarantine timer for paging.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrSdsAttachedSub.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of subscribers on the MME that are registered on an SDS GW through the SGs-Lite interface. The gauge is incremented when a UE newly registers in the MME and the MME receives an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-ACK message with cause code "success" from an SDS GW, for example, in the Attach, Inter-TAU, GEO recovery, and Move (target side) procedures. The gauge is decremented when the MME sends an SGSLite-IMSI-DETACH-INDICATION message to an SDS GW.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note# Note: This gauge is restricted and not for general use.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrConnectionSuspendedSub.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of suspended UE contexts. The gauge is incremented when a UE context is suspended as a result of a successful Connection Suspend procedure. The gauge is decremented when a UE context is resumed as a result of a successful Connection Resume procedure, or when the MME receives signaling from the UE. It is also decremented when a UE context is released as a result of an S1 Release procedure, or when the UE is detached.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccEnodebListPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on the latest visited eNodeB list, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of a paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request message or any other NAS message from the #UE# is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NonBroadcastedLAIUsed.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times for which the Old location area identifier IE is filled with the non-broadcasted LAI in the Location Update Request message sent from the MME to an MSC.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrvccCsOnlyToWSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful SRVCC CS only procedures to WCDMA in the MME. It is incremented each time an SRVCC CS only procedure is successfully concluded, at the reception of an SRVCC PS to CS Complete Notification message from the MSC server over the Sv interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_G_RA
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_G_RA area.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrActAttachedSubRA.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers per #RA# within this SGSN.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccNormalIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed normal intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. Periodic #RA# updates and #RA# updates acting as resume of a suspended #MS# are not counted. The counter is not stepped when resending a #RA# Update Accept message to the #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccFirstPsPagingGb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful PS paging procedures that are successful at the first paging message in the paging procedure.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttImsiCombiIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of combined #RA#/#LA# updates with #IMSI# attach (intra-SGSN) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. These are counted as attempts. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccGprsDetachSgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed #SGSN#-initiated #GPRS# detach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttImsiCombiInterSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of combined #RA#/#LA# updates with #IMSI# attach (inter-#SGSN#) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. These are counted as attempts.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccGprsAttach.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #GPRS# attach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccCombiInterSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed combined #RA#/#LA# updates (inter-#SGSN#) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttCombiIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of combined #RA#/#LA# updates (intra-SGSN) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. These are counted as attempts. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccInterSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures in this #SGSN#. The counter is incremented when #RAU# Accept is transmitted.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttInterSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttCombiInterSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of combined #RA#/#LA# updates (inter-#SGSN#) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. These are counted as attempts.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccCombiIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed combined #RA#/#LA# update (intra-SGSN) procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttPsPagingProcGb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PS# paging procedures initiated at the #SGSN# over the Gb interface. The counter is incremented when a #PS# paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current #P-TMSI#, optionally followed by paging messages with the old #P-TMSI#. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new #DL# #PDU#, is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with #IMSI# (due to abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsAttach.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# attach procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttNormalIntraSgsnRaUpdate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted normal intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. Periodic #RA# updates and #RA# updates acting as resume of a suspended #MS# are not counted. Resending from #MSs# is also counted. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsDetachSgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# detach procedures initiated by #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccPsPagingProcGb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# paging procedures initiated at the #SGSN# over the Gb interface. The initial paging procedures as well as the repeated paging procedures are counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsDetachMs.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MS#-initiated #GPRS# detach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_G area.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC17.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttCancelLocHlrOp.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted GPRS detaches initiated by the HLR within an SGSN. It is incremented when a Cancel Location message is received from the HLR with the cancelation type "subscription withdrawn". Resent Cancel Location messages from the HLR are also counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC9.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures that return cause code #9, "MS identity cannot be derived by the network".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttDetachInactiveSub.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted detach of inactive subscribers procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttAuthCiphReqNon3GPPCompliant.G
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted authentication and ciphering procedures, the number of 'Authentication and Ciphering Request' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non #3GPP# compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRAUCSPSCoord.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Intra-SGSN RAU procedures being rejected due to the coordination of CS and PS in a MOCN constellation. The Intra-SGSN ISC procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterRauUscDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: The number of Inter-SGSN RAU messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Inter-SGSN RAU message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC17.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRau.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS#.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of high inter routing area failure rates, typically caused by roaming agreements. To find out if there are real problems, subtract the unsuccessful inter routing area requests due to cause code 9 (MS identity cannot be derived by the network), cause code 14 (#GPRS# services not allowed in this #PLMN#) and cause code 15 (No Suitable Cells In Location Area).

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC15.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #15, "No Suitable Cells In Location Area". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PtmsiReallocation.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of P-TMSI reallocation procedures initiated by the SGSN. The counter is incremented when a P-TMSI Reallocation Command message is sent to the MS. The resending of the P-TMSI Reallocation Command message is not counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrHomeSub.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #GPRS# home subscribers located in the #SGSN# location register. The #GPRS# #MM# state of this subscriber is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. Only #GPRS# subscribers that are homed in the same #GPRS# network are considered.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC11.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #11, "PLMN not allowed".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCSPSCoord.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Attach procedures being rejected due to the coordination of CS and PS in a MOCN constellation.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC14.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttChangeOfLocalTime.G
EntityDef.description: Incremented when #SGSN# detects an attempt to change in offset and/or daylight savings time in #SGSNs# handling of #MS# local time.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC6.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful MM attach procedures per SGSN due to cause code #6, "Illegal ME". It is incremented when the SGSN returns an Attach Reject message to the MS with cause code #6 or aborts the attach procedure due to an IMEISV check failure without sending the reject message.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC14.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN RAU procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrCamelSub.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscriber within this #SGSN# area with #CAMEL# service. The counter is not incremented if the subscriber only have O-SMS CAMEL activated, and not GPRS CAMEL.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 40% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 35% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrVisitingForeign.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of international roaming subscribers in the #SGSN#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is not part of the #PLMN#s supported by the #SGSN#. The #GPRS# #MM# state of these subscribers is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with different #MCC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #RAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.RauFailNoIpv4.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful RAU procedures due to no IPv4 address in GGSN/PGW control plane or user plane in the (SGSN) Context Response in WCDMA access. Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: To find out the problems, check the MME/SGSN from which the UE comes. The UE may activate PDP context/EPS bearer with only IPv6 address in the GGSN/PGW control plane or user plane.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttIntraSgsnRaUpdateUscDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of attempted Intra-SGSN Routing Area Update procedures that are discarded by UE Signaling Control. Incremented when UE Signaling Control is activated, and when it identifies a Intra-SGSN Routing Area Request message from the SGSN during a control period. Applies to GSM systems only.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC13.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful MM inter-SGSN RAU procedures that return cause code 13, "Roaming not allowed in this location area".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC13.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this location area".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC8.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #8, "GPRS and non GPRS services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttLastVisitedCellPaging.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted paging procedures based on last visited cell. This counter is incremented when a Paging Request message is sent to the cell the UE has just visited. That is at the transmission of the first paging message in a paging selection of LastVisitedCell within a paging profile. Retransmission of Paging Request messages based on last visited cell is not counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC15.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the MS with cause code #15, No Suitable Cells In Location Area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccLastVisitedCellPaging.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on LastVisitedCell, irrespective of the paging being an initial Paging Request message or the resending of a Paging Request message. The counter is incremented when an LLC Frame from MS is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttRaPaging.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of attempted paging procedures based on the RA a UE has registered. The counter is incremented when a Paging Request is sent to the whole RA. That is at the transmission of the first paging message in a paging selection of RA within a paging profile. Retransmission of Paging Request based on RA is not counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.nbrDetachedInactiveSub.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of detached inactive subscribers within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC10.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS# with cause code #10, Implicitly detached.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttRauAcceptNon3GPPCompliant.G
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted routing area update procedures, the number of 'Routing Area Update Accept' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non #3GPP# compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrAttachedPsm.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of #UEs# currently in Power Saving Mode (PSM). The gauge is incremented when a #UE# enters PSM, that is when the active timer expires and the implicit detach timer is started. The gauge is decremented when a #UE# leaves PSM, that is when any kind of signaling from the #UE# is received or when the #UE# is implicitly detached.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrActAttachedSub.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers within this #SGSN-MME# area. Note that this gauge reflects the correct number of attached subscribers in the #SGSN-MME#. The gauge will then be incremented and decremented in other cases as well, that is, Inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update, Implicitly Detached, and so on.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication that the #SGSN-MME# is approaching the maximum number of attached subscribers. Offload the #SGSN-MME#, for example, by moving one or more #BSC#s to a less loaded #SGSN-MME#.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SuccRaPaging.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures based on RA, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when an LLC Frame from MS is received.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC7.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #7, "GPRS Services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC22.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #22, "Congestion".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRau.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of high intra routing area failure rates, typically caused by roaming agreements. To find out if there are real problems, subtract the unsuccessful intra routing area updates due to cause code 14 (#GPRS# services not allowed in this #PLMN#) and cause code 15 (No Suitable Cells In Location Area).

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccISRAUCSPSCoord.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-SGSN RAU procedures being rejected due to the coordination of CS and PS in a MOCN constellation.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrVisitingNatSub.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of national roaming subscribers in the #SGSN#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is one of the #MCC#s of the #PLMN#s supported by the #SGSN#. The #GPRS# #MM# state of these subscribers is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with the same #MCC#s but different #MNC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #RAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccRauCC17RedirectionInd.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful RAU procedures with the cause code #17 "Network Failure" and the SGSN provides Redirection Indication to the BSC in a MOCN constellation. Intra-RAU, inter-RAU and ISC are all counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC17.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC15.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #15, "No suitable cells in location area".

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrMsisdnLessSub.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of MSISDN-less subscribers that have registered at this SGSN (GSM). MSISDN-less subscribers are subscribers without the MSISDN at the HLR or HSS. The gauge is increased when an MSISDN-less subscriber successfully attaches to this SGSN. The gauge is decreased when an MSISDN-less subscriber is detached from this SGSN. The gauge can be also updated when inter-SGSN RAU, ISC RAU, or SGSN pool move is performed for an MSISDN-less subscriber.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC14.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC96.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful MM attach procedures that return cause code #96, "Mandatory information element error".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttAttachAcceptNon3GPPCompliant.G
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted attach procedures, the number of 'Attach Accept' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non 3GPP compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #GSM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUscDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: The number of Attach Request messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Attach Request message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC17RedirectionInd.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Attach procedures with the cause code #17 "Network Failure" and the SGSN provides Redirection Indication to the BSC in a MOCN constellation.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_G_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_G_U area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TadsRequestHlrAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted T-ADS requests from HLR. It is incremented when a Provide Subscriber Information message with the Requested Info IE indicating T-ADS is received from HLR.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PurgeMsHlrSucc
