EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Gr Purge MS procedures in the SGSN.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PurgeMsHlrAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Gr Purge MS procedures in the SGSN.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachLicenseExceeded
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach and inter-#SGSN# #RAU# procedures due to the capacity license SAU Attach Limit being exceeded.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_Hss
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_MM_Hss area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PurgeUeHssSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful S6a/S6d Purge UE procedures in the SGSN-MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.TadsRequestHssAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted T-ADS requests from HSS. It is incremented when an Insert Subscriber Data Request message with the IDR-flags IE indicating T-ADS Data Request is received from HSS.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PurgeUeHssAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S6a/S6d Purge UE procedures in the SGSN-MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdLocHssAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S6a/S6d Update Location procedures in the SGSN-MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UpdLocHssSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful S6a/S6d Update Location procedures in the SGSN-MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.UesWithLocationNotConfirmed
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of UEs whose location is currently not updated towards the HSS/HLR. This can happen either after HSS/HLR reset, or when attach throttling is activated and a Geo-Redundant failover happens or during and after a pool move.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_U_RA
EntityDef.description: This PM group defines UMTS measurement types for mobility management that are measured per RA within this SGSN.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccPsPagingHPAProcIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of all successful HPA paging procedures initiated at the SGSN over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsDetachSgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# detach procedures initiated by #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttPsPagingHPAProcIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted HPA paging procedures initiated at the SGSN over the Iu interface. The counter is incremented when an HPA paging procedure is started, that is, at the transmission of the first HPA Paging Request message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more Paging Request messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by Paging Request messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of Paging Request messages, triggered by a new DL PDU, is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with IMSI (due to an abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsAttach.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# attach procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccNormalIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed normal intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. Periodic #RA# updates are not counted. The counter is not stepped when resending #RA# Update Accept message to the #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccFirstPsPagingIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# paging procedures that are successful at the first Paging Request message in the paging procedure.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttNormalIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted normal intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. Periodic #RA# updates are not counted. Resending from #MSs# is also counted. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrActAttachedSubRA.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers per #RA# within this #SGSN#.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccGprsAttach.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #GPRS# attach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccPsPagingProcIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of all successful #PS# paging procedures initiated at the #SGSN# over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttGprsDetachMs.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MS#-initiated #GPRS# detach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttPsPagingProcIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted PS paging procedures initiated at the SGSN over the Iu interface. The counter is incremented when a PS paging procedure is started, that is, at the transmission of the first Paging Request message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more Paging Request messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by Paging Request messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of Paging Request messages, triggered by a new DL PDU, is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with IMSI (due to an abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccInterSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures in this #SGSN#. The counter is incremented when #RAU# Accept is transmitted.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttInterSgsnRaUpdate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccGprsDetachSgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed #SGSN#-initiated #GPRS# detach procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: MM.SuccFirstPsPagingHPAIu
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful HPA paging procedures that are successful at the first Paging Request message in the paging procedure.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_MM_U
EntityDef.description: This PM group defines UMTS measurement types for mobility management that are measured per SGSN.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC17.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC17.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceRequestUscRejected.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC10.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS# with cause code #10, Implicitly detached.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttCancelLocHlrOp.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted GPRS detaches initiated by the HLR within an SGSN. It is incremented when a Cancel Location message is received from the HLR with the cancelation type "subscription withdrawn". Resent Cancel Location messages from the HLR are also counted.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttRauAcceptNon3GPPCompliant.U
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted routing area update procedures, the number of 'Routing Area Update Accept' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non #3GPP# compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #WCDMA#.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC22.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #22, "Congestion".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IuReleaseRadioConnectionLost
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of RNC-initiated Iu releases due to cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost".
Trigger: Sending Iu Release Command to the RNC after receiving an Iu Release Request with cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccISRAUCSPSCoord.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of inter-#SGSN# RAU procedures being rejected due to coordination of #CS# and #PS# in a #MOCN# constellation.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttServiceRequest.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Service request procedures of data, signaling, or paging response type, in the #SGSN#. It is incremented when a Service Request is received from the #MS#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.SrnsContextRequest
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SRNS Context Transfers in the #SGSN#. This counter is increased when the #SGSN# sends an SRNS Context Request to the #RNC#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.HssHlrFallbSucc.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement is part of the "HSS/HLR-selection based on EPC Capability" function.
It provides the number of successful transactions to #HLR# after a previous #HSS#/#HLR#-fallback.
Trigger: the successful completion of a Send Authentication Info-, or a Send Parameters-, or an Update #GPRS# Location-service to the #HLR# after a failed #HSS# answer.
Note: This measurement is only applicable for the SGSN-MME with single W access or LW dual access.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUscRejected.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Attach Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.RauFailNoIpv4.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful RAU procedures due to no IPv4 address in GGSN/PGW control plane or user plane in the (SGSN) Context Response in WCDMA access. Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: To find out the problems, check the MME/SGSN from which the UE comes. The UE may activate PDP context/EPS bearer with only IPv6 address in the GGSN/PGW control plane or user plane.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrSubPmmConnected
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of subscribers in PMM-CONNECTED state.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IuRelease
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Iu releases in the #SGSN#. Both #RNC# and SGSN initiated releases are counted. Trigger: Sending Iu Release Command to the RNC.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrVisitingForeign.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of international roaming subscribers in the #SGSN#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is not part of the #PLMN#s supported by the #SGSN#. The #GPRS# #MM# state of these subscribers is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with different #MCC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #RAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC6.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful MM attach procedures per SGSN due to cause code #6, "Illegal ME". It is incremented when the SGSN returns an Attach Reject message to the MS with cause code #6 or aborts the attach procedure due to an IMEISV check failure without sending the reject message.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.ServiceRequestUscDetached.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Service Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Service Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccServiceReq.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Service Request procedures in the #SGSN#. This counter is increased whenever an Service Reject message is sent except for being sent by the reject action of UE Signaling Control.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttAuthCiphReqNon3GPPCompliant.U
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted authentication and ciphering procedures, the number of 'Authentication and Ciphering Request' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non #3GPP# compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #WCDMA#.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.HssHlrFallbAtt.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement is part of the "HSS/HLR-selection based on EPC Capability" function.
It provides the number of attempted fallbacks to #HLR# after a failed #HSS# answer.
Trigger: the initiation of a Send Authentication Info-, or a Send Parameters-, or an Update #GPRS# Location-service to the #HLR# after a failed #HSS# answer.
Note: This measurement is only applicable for the SGSN-MME with single W access or LW dual access.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC15.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS# with cause code #15, No Suitable Cells In Location Area.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC17.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSNJ #RAU# procedures that return cause code #17, "Network failure".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC14.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC11.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #11, "PLMN not allowed".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC15.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #15, "No Suitable Cells In Location Area". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttDetachInactiveSub.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted detach of inactive subscribers procedures within this SGSN area.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC15.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #15, "No suitable cells in location area".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC7.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #7, "GPRS Services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC9.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures that return cause code #9, "MS identity cannot be derived by the network".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRau.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of high intra routing area failure rates, typically caused by roaming agreements. To find out if there are real problems, subtract the unsuccessful intra routing area updates due to cause code 14 (#GPRS# services not allowed in this #PLMN#) and cause code 15 (No Suitable Cells In Location Area).

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrActAttachedSub.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers within this #SGSN-MME# area. Note that this gauge reflects the correct number of attached subscribers in the #SGSN-MME#. The gauge will then be incremented and decremented in other cases as well, that is, Inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update, Implicitly Detached, and so on.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication that the #SGSN-MME# is approaching the maximum number of attached subscribers. Offload the #SGSN-MME#, for example, by moving one or more #RNC#s to a less loaded #SGSN-MME#.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraSgsnRaUpdateUscRejected.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Routing Area Update Request messages of Intra-SGSN RAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Routing Area Update Request message of Intra-SGSN RAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportFailureChangeOfServiceArea.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report messages with the "Change of Service Area" request type, and a failure cause or no SAI. This counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a RANAP Location Report message with the "Change of Service Area" request type from the RNC over the Iu interface and the message has a failure cause or does not have an SAI.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC14.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN".

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRauCC13.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful MM inter-SGSN RAU procedures that return cause code 13, "Roaming not allowed in this location area".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttAttachAcceptNon3GPPCompliant.U
EntityDef.description: This is the name of the counter that gives, for attempted attach procedures, the number of 'Attach Accept' messages that are altered during retransmission due to non #3GPP# compliant #UEs#. The parameter is only valid for #WCDMA#.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRAUCSPSCoord.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of intra-SGSN #RAU# procedures being rejected due to the coordination of #CS# and #PS# in a #MOCN# constellation. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccInterSgsnRau.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures, that is, whenever a Routing Area Update Reject message is sent to the #MS#.
This is an indication of high inter routing area failure rates, typically caused by roaming agreements. To find out if there are real problems, subtract the unsuccessful inter routing area requests due to cause code 9 (MS identity cannot be derived by the network), cause code 14 (#GPRS# services not allowed in this #PLMN#) and cause code 15 (No Suitable Cells In Location Area).

EntityDef.name: MM.AttChangeOfLocalTime.U
EntityDef.description: Incremented when #SGSN# detects an attempt to change in offset and/or daylight savings time in #SGSNs# handling of #MS# local time.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IntraSgsnRaUpdateUscDetached.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Routing Area Update Request messages of Intra-SGSN RAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Routing Area Update Request message of Intra-SGSN RAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.nbrDetachedInactiveSub.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of detached inactive subscribers within this SGSN area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterRauUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: The number of Inter-SGSN RAU messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Inter-SGSN RAU message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrHomeSub.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #GPRS# home subscribers located in the #SGSN# location register. The #GPRS# #MM# state of this subscriber is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. Only #GPRS# subscribers that are homed in the same #GPRS# network are considered.

EntityDef.name: MM.AttIntraSgsnRaUpdateUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of attempted Intra-SGSN Routing Area Update procedures that are discarded by UE Signaling Control. Incremented when UE Signaling Control is activated, and when it identifies a Intra-SGSN Routing Area Request message from the SGSN during a control period. Applies to WCDMA systems only.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrCamelSub.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscriber within this #SGSN# area with #CAMEL# service.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 40% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 35% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportControlChangeOfServiceArea.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Reporting Control messages with the "Change of Service Area" request type sent by the SGSN. This counter is incremented when the SGSN sends a RANAP Location Reporting Control message with the "Change of Service Area" request type to the RNC over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC13.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #13, "Roaming not allowed in this location area".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.AttachUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: The number of Attach Request messages discarded by the SGSN due to UE Signaling Control. The counter applies only when UE Signaling Control is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Attach Request message is identified and discarded during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrMsisdnLessSub.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of MSISDN-less subscribers that have registered at this SGSN (WCDMA). MSISDN-less subscribers are subscribers without the MSISDN at the HLR or HSS. The gauge is increased when an MSISDN-less subscriber successfully attaches to this SGSN. The gauge is decreased when an MSISDN-less subscriber is detached from this SGSN. The gauge can be also updated when inter-SGSN RAU, ISC RAU, or SGSN pool move is performed for an MSISDN-less subscriber.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.IuReleaseUserInactivity
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of RNC-initiated Iu releases due to cause "User Inactivity".
Trigger: Sending Iu Release Command to the RNC after receiving an Iu Release Request with cause "User Inactivity".

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrNwSharingNonSuppUe.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers which are network sharing non-supporting UEs within the MOCN enabled #SGSN-MME# area. Note that this gauge reflects the correct number of attached subscribers which are network sharing non-supporting UEs in the MOCN enabled #SGSN-MME#. The gauge is incremented and decremented in other cases as well, that is, Inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update, Implicitly Detached, and so on.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.NbrNwSharingSuppUe.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attached subscribers which are network sharing supporting UEs within the MOCN enabled SGSN-MME area.
Note that this gauge reflects the correct number of attached subscribers which are network sharing supporting UEs in the MOCN enabled SGSN-MME. The gauge is incremented and decremented in other cases as well, that is, Inter-SGSN RA Update, Implicitly Detached, and so on.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.InterRauUscRejected.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Routing Area Update Request messages of Inter-SGSN RAU that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a Routing Area Update Request message of Inter-SGSN RAU is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCSPSCoord.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach procedures being rejected due to coordination of #CS# and #PS# in a #MOCN# constellation.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationReportChangeOfServiceArea.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Location Report messages with the "Change of Service Area" request type and an SAI received by the SGSN. This counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a RANAP Location Report message with the "Change of Service Area" request type and an SAI from the RNC over the Iu interface.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccIntraSgsnRauCC14.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures that return cause code #14, "GPRS services not allowed in this PLMN". The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: MM.UnsuccAttachCC8.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #MM# attach procedures that return cause code #8, "GPRS and non GPRS services not allowed".

EntityDef.name: MM.AttServiceRequestUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of attempted Service Request procedures of data, signaling, and paging response types that are discarded by UE Signaling Control. Incremented when UE Signaling Control is activated, and when it identifies a Service Request message from a UE during a control period.

EntityDef.name: MM.NbrVisitingNatSub.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of national roaming subscribers in the #SGSN#, where the #MCC# in the #IMSI# number is one of the #MCC#s of the #PLMN#s supported by the #SGSN#. The #GPRS# #MM# state of these subscribers is GMM_REGISTERED or GMM_DEREGISTERED. #Note: Home subscribers with the same #MCC#s but different #MNC#s included in the #IMSI# number and accessing #RAI# are also counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: MM.AttServiceReqData.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Service request procedures of data type in the #SGSN#. It is incremented when Service request, with service type data, is received from the MS.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.PtmsiReallocation.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of P-TMSI reallocation procedures initiated by the SGSN. The counter is incremented when a P-TMSI Reallocation Command message is sent to the MS. The resending of the P-TMSI Reallocation Command message is not counted.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_G area.

EntityDef.name: succInterSgsnRaUpdateVisitor
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures initiated by visiting #GPRS# subscribers within this #SGSN# area. Visiting subscribers are defined by the roaming status parameter in the #IMSI# number series configuration.

EntityDef.name: succGprsAttachVisitor
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #GPRS# attach procedures within this #SGSN# area, initiated by visiting #GPRS# subscribers. Visiting subscribers are defined by the roaming status parameter in the #IMSI# number series configuration. If the SGSN resends an Attach Accept message to the #MS#, the counter is not incremented. If the SGSN receives an Attach Request message indicating Combined #GPRS# or #IMSI# Attach and the #IMSI# (CS) Attach did fail whereas the #GPRS# Attach was successful, the counter is not incremented.

EntityDef.name: attIntraSgsnRaUpdate
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. Both sendings and resending from #MSs# are counted. All types of intra-SGSN #RA# Update requests are counted: normal #RA# update, periodic #RA# update and #RA# update acting as resume of a suspended #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: discardedGprsAttach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded attach requests on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements. #GPRS# attach and GPRS attach with #IMSI# already attached are included.

EntityDef.name: attInterSgsnRaUpdateVisitor
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-SGSN #RAU# procedures initiated by visiting #GPRS# subscribers within this #SGSN#, where the old #RA# is served by another #SGSN#. Visiting subscribers are defined by the roaming status parameter in the #IMSI# number series configuration. Resendings from #MSs# are not counted.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 0.2% of the SAU Capacity License
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 0.1% of the SAU Capacity License

EntityDef.name: gprsMmSgsnUnsuccessfulAttachRequests
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful attach request per #SGSN-MME#, that is, whenever an attach reject message is sent.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of high attach failure rates, typically caused by a decision not to allow #GPRS# usage for some subscriber categories. To find out if there are real problems, subtract the unsuccessful attaches due to cause code 7 (#GPRS# not allowed), cause code 8 (#GPRS# services and non-#GPRS# services not allowed) and cause code 14 (#GPRS# services not allowed in this #PLMN#). If the attach failure rate remains on a high failure rate, continue the troubleshooting by checking the #SS7# network.

EntityDef.name: attGprsAttach
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# attach procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. Resendings from #MSs# are also counted.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 1% of the SAU Capacity License
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 0.5% of the SAU Capacity License

EntityDef.name: attGprsDetachMs
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# detach procedures within this #SGSN# area. Resendings from #MSs# are also counted.

EntityDef.name: succIntraSgsnRaUpdate
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed intra-SGSN #RA# update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#. The counter is not stepped when resending #RA# update "accept". All types of intra-SGSN #RA# update requests are counted: normal #RA# update, periodic #RA# update and #RA# update acting as resume of a suspended #MS#. The intra-SGSN #ISC# procedures are not included in this measurement.

EntityDef.name: attPacketSwitchingPaging
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttPsPagingProcGb measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succGprsAttach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed #GPRS# attach procedures within this #SGSN# area. The counter is not incremented when resending Attach Accept to the #MS#. If an Attach Request indicating Combined #GPRS#/#IMSI# Attach was received and the #IMSI# (CS) Attach failed but the #GPRS# Attach was successful, the counter is not incremented.

EntityDef.name: gprsMmSgsnSuccessfulPagingProcedures
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccPsPagingProcGb measurement types.

EntityDef.name: discardedRaUpdate
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded routing area update requests on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements

EntityDef.name: unsuccPacketSwitchingPaging
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful packet switched paging procedures over the Gb interface within this #SGSN-MME# area, that is, packet switching paging procedures that are re-started when the previous attempt has timed out. The counter is incremented when a #PS# paging procedure has failed, that is, at timeout after transmission of the last paging message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current #P-TMSI#, optionally followed by paging messages with the old #P-TMSI#. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new #DL# PDU, is regarded as a new procedure. Note that the total number of attempts minus successful attempts is not the same as unsuccessful due to discarded messages and re-sendings of messages.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of high paging failure rates, typically caused by lack of radio coverage. Continue the troubleshooting in the radio network.

EntityDef.name: nbrOfSubReady
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of subscribers in READY state within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: succGprsDetachSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed #GPRS# detach procedures #SGSN#-initiated within this #SGSN# area. The procedure is not considered successful if Detach Accept is not received, even though the #MS# is detached in the network.

EntityDef.name: discardedCombiRaUpdate
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded combined routing area update requests on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements.

EntityDef.name: discardedCombiAttach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded combined attach requests on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements. For information about the possible reject causes, refer to the Cause Codes and Events document.

EntityDef.name: discardedAttachMsError
EntityDef.description: The discardedAttachMsError counter is incremented when there is a rejected attach because the #MS# has wrong #TLLI#. There is an #IMSI# attach on non-random #TLLI#.

EntityDef.name: attCombiDetachMs
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Combined #GPRS#/#IMSI# detach procedures #MS#-initiated within this #SGSN# area. Both sendings and resendings from #MSs# are counted.

EntityDef.name: gprsMmSgsnPagingProcedures
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted paging procedures initiated at the #SGSN# over the Gb interface. The counter is incremented when a paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message in the procedure. The #PS# paging procedure consists of one or more paging messages with the current #P-TMSI#, optionally followed by paging messages with the old #P-TMSI#. A new set of paging messages, triggered by a new #DL# #PDU#, is regarded as a new procedure. Paging with #IMSI# (due to abnormal situation) is also regarded as a new procedure. This measurement counts both #CS# and #PS# paging procedures. Note that there is no repetition for #CS# paging, hence each #CS# paging message is counted as one procedure.

EntityDef.name: attGprsDetachSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# detach procedures initiated by #SGSN#. The counter is incremented when sending Detach Request to an #MS#. The counter is not incremented when resending Detach Request to the #MS#.

EntityDef.name: attGprsAttachVisitor
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted #GPRS# attach procedures, within this #SGSN# area, initiated by visiting #GPRS# subscribers . Visiting subscribers are defined by the roaming status parameter in the #IMSI# number series configuration. Resendings from #MSs# are not counted.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 0.2% of the SAU Capacity License
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 0.1% of the SAU Capacity License

EntityDef.name: discardedDetach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded detach requests on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements.

EntityDef.name: succInterSgsnRaUpdate
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures in this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: attImsiDetachMs
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #IMSI# detach procedures #MS#-initiated within this #SGSN# area. Both sendings and resendings from #MSs# are counted.

EntityDef.name: attInterSgsnRaUpdate
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-#SGSN# #RA# Update procedures initiated in this #SGSN#, where the old #RA# is served by another #SGSN#. Both sendings and resending from #MSs# are also counted.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 1% of the SAU Capacity License
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 0.5% of the SAU Capacity License

EntityDef.name: succCombiAttach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed of Combined #GPRS#/#IMSI# attach procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. The counter is not incremented when resending Attach Accept to the #MS#. If the #IMSI# (CS) Attach failed but the #GPRS# Attach was successful, no counters are incremented.

EntityDef.name: discardedPayloadPacket
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded payload #PDUs# on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements.

EntityDef.name: attCombiAttach
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempt of combined #GPRS#/#IMSI# attach procedures initiated within this #SGSN# area. Both sendings and resendings from #MSs# are counted.

EntityDef.name: gprsMmSgsnRejectedByAdmissionControl
EntityDef.description: Number of Attach or Inter-#SGSN# #RA#-update requests that were rejected by admission control. The request is rejected and fault code 22 is sent to the #MS#, indicating congestion. The admission control reject is caused by maximum #SAU# limit reached.

EntityDef.name: nbrOfSubStandby
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of subscribers in STANDBY state within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_UnstableSubscribers
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_UnstableSubscribers area.

EntityDef.name: subscribersInTransitionalState
EntityDef.description:
The gauge shows the number of subscribers in transitional state, that is, the number of users that are in the middle of Attach/Detach or #PDP# context Activation/Deactivation procedures.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This is an indication of a high number of subscribers in a transitional state, and that the signaling procedures can not be completed in a reasonable time. This can be caused by overload. Check the networks and external interfaces for congestion. For more information, see Troubleshooting.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 2 % of attach limit (hard limit)
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 1.99 % of attach limit (hard limit)

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Mobility_U
EntityDef.description: This PM group defines UMTS measurement types for mobility management that are measured per SGSN.

EntityDef.name: attGprsAttachUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttGprsAttach.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: attGprsDetachMsUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttGprsDetachMs.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: attPacketSwitchingPagingHPAUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttPsPagingHPAProcIu measurement types.

EntityDef.name: unsuccGprsAttachUmts
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful attach request per #SGSN#. This counter is increased whenever an Attach Reject message is sent except for being sent by the reject action of UE Signaling Control.
Note: The number of successful attempts subtracted from the total number of attempts does not equal the number of unsuccessful attempts due to discarded messages, resent messages, and messages controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature.

EntityDef.name: succInterSgsnRaUpdateUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccInterSgsnRaUpdate.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succGprsAttachUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccGprsAttach.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succIntraSgsnRaUpdateUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succGprsDetachSgsnUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccGprsDetachSgsn.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: attPacketSwitchingPagingUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttPsPagingProcIu measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succPacketSwitchingPagingHPAUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccPsPagingHPAProcIu measurement types.

EntityDef.name: attIntraSgsnRaUpdateUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttIntraSgsnRaUpdate.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: succPacketSwitchingPagingUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.SuccPsPagingProcIu measurement types.

EntityDef.name: unsuccPacketSwitchingPagingHPAUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful HPA paging procedures over the Iu interface per SGSN. The counter is incremented when an HPA paging procedure has failed. That is, at timeout after transmission of the last HPA Paging Request message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more Paging Request messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by Paging Request messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of Paging Request messages, triggered by a new DL PDU, is regarded as a new procedure. Note that the total number of attempted paging procedures minus the total number of successful paging procedures is not the same as the total number of unsuccessful paging procedures. This is because discarded and retransmitted paging messages are not counted as unsuccessful paging procedures.

EntityDef.name: attGprsDetachSgsnUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttGprsDetachSgsn.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: unsuccPacketSwitchingPagingUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful packet switched paging procedures over the Iu interface per SGSN. That is, packet switching paging procedures that are re-started when the previous attempt has timed out. The counter is incremented when a PS paging procedure has failed. That is, at timeout after transmission of the last Paging Request message in the procedure. The paging procedure consists of one or more Paging Request messages with the current P-TMSI, optionally followed by Paging Request messages with the old P-TMSI. A new set of Paging Request messages, triggered by a new DL PDU, is regarded as a new procedure. Note that the total number of attempted paging procedures minus the total number of successful paging procedures is not the same as the total number of unsuccessful paging procedures. This is because discarded and retransmitted paging messages are not counted as unsuccessful paging procedures.

EntityDef.name: attInterSgsnRaUpdateUmts
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the aggregation of the MM.AttInterSgsnRaUpdate.U measurement types.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SRNSRelocation_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SRNSRelocation_U area.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.FailInterSGSNInt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives an Inter SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the RNC and the relocation procedure fails to continue due to internal reasons or when the old SGSN receives a "Forward Relocation Response" message but not all of the needed RABs are allocated in the new SGSN. The number of failed Inter-SGSN Relocation from S4-SGSN to Gn-SGSN is also counted. The counter is not incremented when old S4-SGSN receives a "Forward Relocation Response" message but not all of the needed RABs are allocated in the new Gn-SGSN.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccInterSGSNNewS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode counted in the new SGSN. The counter is incremented when the new SGSN receives a "Relocation Complete" message from the target RNC.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.FailInterSGSNS16Int
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Inter SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures for a UE using S4 mode counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives an Inter S4-SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC, the target RA is served by a new SGSN, and the relocation procedure fails to continue due to internal reasons.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.FailIntraSGSNS16Int
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Intra SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures for a UE using S4 mode. The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives an Intra S4-SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC, the target RA is served by the same SGSN, and the relocation procedure fails to continue due to internal reasons.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.FailIntraSGSNInt
RELOC.AttInterSGSNOldS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives an Inter S4-SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC and the target RA is served by a new SGSN.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures and intra-SGSN/MME IRAT handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a "Relocation Complete" message from the target RNC.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.AttInterSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives an Inter SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC. The number of attempted Inter-SGSN Relocation from S4-SGSN to Gn-SGSN is also counted.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.AttInterSGSNNewS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode counted in the new SGSN. The counter is incremented when the new SGSN receives a "Forward Relocation Request" message from the old SGSN.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.AttInterSGSNNew
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted inter-#SGSN# #SRNS# Relocation procedures and inter #SGSN#/#MME# #IRAT# handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access counted in the new #SGSN#. The counter is incremented when the new #SGSN# receives an #SRNS# "Forward Relocation Request" message from the old #SGSN# or old #MME#. #Note: The Gn-#SGSN# as target side does not have enough information to decide if the source side is #SGSN# or #MME# during inter node #HO# from #GTPv1# Forward Relocation Request. Therefore, the Gn-#SGSN# uses RELOC.AttInterSGSNNew instead of VS.IRATHO.LteAttInc.U for all inter #HO# from #SGSN# or #MME#.Note#

EntityDef.name: RELOC.AttIntraSGSNS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode. The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives an Intra S4-SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC and the target RA is served by the same SGSN.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccInterSGSNNew
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful inter-#SGSN# #SRNS# Relocation procedures and inter #SGSN#/#MME# #IRAT# handover procedures from #LTE# access to #UMTS# access. The counter is incremented when the new #SGSN# receives a "Forward Relocation Complete Acknowledge" message from the old #SGSN# or old #MME#, or the new #SGSN# fails to receive the "Forward Relocation Complete Acknowledge" message due to #GTP# message timeout after N3 timeouts and resendings. #Note: The Gn-#SGSN# as target side does not have enough information to decide if the source side is #SGSN# or #MME# during inter node #HO# from #GTPv1# Forward Relocation Request. Therefore, the Gn-#SGSN# uses RELOC.SuccInterSGSNNew instead of VS.IRATHO.LteSuccInc.U for all inter #HO# from #SGSN# or #MME#.Note#

EntityDef.name: RELOC.AttIntraSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Intra-SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures. The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives an Intra-SGSN SRNS "Relocation Required" message from the source RNC.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccInterSGSNOldS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives a "Forward Relocation Complete Notification" message from the new SGSN.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccInterSGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Inter-SGSN SRNS Relocation procedures counted in the old SGSN. The counter is incremented when the old SGSN receives a "Forward Relocation Complete" message from the new SGSN. The number of successful Inter-SGSN Relocation from S4-SGSN to Gn-SGSN is also counted.

EntityDef.name: RELOC.SuccIntraSGSNS16
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Intra-SGSN SRNS Relocation for a UE using S4 mode. The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a "Relocation Complete" message from the target RNC.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_GbNetworkService
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the GbNetworkService area.

EntityDef.name: nsUplinkPacketsSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink #NS# packets received from the BSC on the Gb interface.

EntityDef.name: nsDownlinkPacketsSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink #NS# packets sent from the SGSN to the BSC on the Gb interface.

EntityDef.name: nsUplinkOctSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink #NS# octets received from the BSC on the Gb interface. ;#Note: This counter counts octets, but the measurement unit of the value is KOctets (1024 octets). Note#

EntityDef.name: nsDownlinkOctSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink #NS# octets sent from the SGSN to the BSC on the Gb interface.;#Note: This counter counts octets, but the measurement unit of the value is KOctets (1024 octets). Note#

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_OSPFArea
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the OSPFArea area.

EntityDef.name: ospfSpfRuns
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times that the intra-area route table has been calculated using this area's link-state database. This is typically done using Dijkstra's algorithm.

EntityDef.name: ospfAreaLsaCount
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of #LSA#s in this area's link-state database, excluding #AS# external #LSA#s.
If OSPF NSSA is used within the area this counter also includes Type 7 #LSA#s. In this case, the supervised threshold could also need to be increased.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: Investigate why that many #LSA#s exist. The network might need to be redesigned. Consider using OSPF NSSA to reduce the number of #LSA#s.

EntityDef.name: ospfAsBdrRtrCount
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of autonomous system border routers reachable within this area. This number is initially zero, and is calculated in each #SPF# pass.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This gauge can only increase as a result of network reconfiguration. No actions are recommended.

EntityDef.name: ospfAreaBdrRtrCount
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the total number of area border routers reachable within this area. This number is initially zero, and is calculated in each #SPF# pass.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: This gauge can only increase as a result of network reconfiguration. No actions are recommended.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_OSPFInterface
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the OSPFInterface area.

EntityDef.name: ospfIfEvents
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times this #OSPF# interface has changed its state, or an error has occurred.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_OSPFNeighbour
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the OSPFNeighbour area.

EntityDef.name: ospfNbrEvents
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times this neighbor relationship has changed state, or an error has occurred.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_OSPFNetwork
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the OSPFNetwork area.

EntityDef.name: ospfExternLsaCount
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of external (LS type 5) #LSA#s in the link-state database. The #SGSN-MME# allows a maximum of 8000 #LSA#s. Exceeding this limit is at the risk of the operator.
Action to be taken if the measurement exceeds its supervised threshold: Investigate why so many external #LSA#s exist and what entity in the network that announces them. The network might need to be redesigned. If OSPF NSSA is not used within the area, consider using it to reduce the number of external #LSA#s.

EntityDef.name: ospfRxNewLsas
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #LSAs# received determined to be new instantiations. This number does not include newer instantiations of self-originated #LSAs#.

EntityDef.name: ospfOriginateNewLsas
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of new #LSAs# that have been originated. The counter is incremented each time the router originates a new #LSA#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_PerformanceManagementFunction
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the PerformanceManagementFunction area.

EntityDef.name: pmReadingsPerOccasion
EntityDef.description: The current maximum number of measurement type readings per reading occasion, that is the peak load caused by performance management.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_PublicWarningSystem
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the PublicWarningSystem area.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.StopWarningRecd.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Stop Warning Request messages received by the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.WriteReplaceWarningSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful (that is, with cause value "0") Write-Replace Warning Response messages sent by the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.KillReqSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Kill Request messages sent by the MME over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.PwsFailureIndSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of PWS Failure Indication messages sent by the MME over the SBc interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.WriteReplaceWarningRecd.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Write-Replace Warning Request messages received by the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.StopWarningSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful (that is, with cause value "0") Stop Warning Response messages sent by the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.PwsRestartIndRecd.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of PWS Restart Indication messages received by the MME over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.KillRespRecd.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of Kill Response messages received by the MME over the S1-MME interface.
Note: The Kill Response message received after the S1TKill timer timeout is also counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.ErrorIndicationSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Error Indication messages sent by the MME on the SBc interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.PwsRestartIndSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of PWS Restart Indication messages sent by the MME over the SBc interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.PwsFailureIndRecd.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of PWS Failure Indication messages received by the MME over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.StopWarningIndSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Stop Warning Indication messages sent by the MME over the SBc interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.WriteReplaceWarningReqSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Write-Replace Warning Request messages sent by the MME over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SBc.WriteReplaceWarningIndSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Write-Replace Warning Indication messages sent by the MME over the SBc interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.S1.WriteReplaceWarningRespRecd.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of Write-Replace Warning Response messages received by the MME over the S1-MME interface.
Note: The Write-Replace Warning Response message received after the S1TWriteReplaceWarning timer timeout is also counted.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_QoS_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the QoS_G area.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActStreamingPdpContext.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# streaming.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLStreamingPktForwarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink streaming packets forwarded on the #LLC# layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.GuaranteedBitRateDowngrades.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #SGSN# has failed to reserve #GBR# resources for traffic class conversational or streaming. In case of streaming, traffic class might have been downgraded to interactive.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLBackgroundPktDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink background packets discarded at policing functionality, flow control and Gb scheduling.

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActStreamingPdpContext.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with streaming #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# streaming class.

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActInteractivePdpContext.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with interactive #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# interactive class, or when the #MS# requests the subscribed #QoS# class which is interactive.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLStreamingPktDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink streaming packets discarded at policing functionality, flow control and Gb scheduling.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLInteractivePktDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink interactive packets discarded at policing functionality, flow control, and Gb scheduling.

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActConversationalPdpContext.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with conversational #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# conversational class.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActInteractivePdpContext.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# interactive.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.GuaranteedBitRateAttempts.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #SGSN# has attempted to reserve #GBR# resources for traffic class conversational or streaming.

EntityDef.name: QoS.CurrentGuaranteedBitRate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the current aggregated #GBR# (up link and #DL#) for the node, related to traffic class conversational and streaming.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1024; Note, if supervision is activated the operator should use following value: 90% of the configured Guaranteed Bit Rate limit.
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 1000; Note, if supervision is activated the operator should use following value: 85% of the configured Guaranteed Bit Rate limit.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLInteractivePktForwarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink interactive packets forwarded on the #LLC# layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLConversationalPktForwarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink conversational packets forwarded on the LLC layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActConversationalPdpContext.G
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# conversational.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLConversationalPktDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink conversational packets discarded through policing, flow control, and Gb scheduling.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLBackgroundPktForwarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink background packets forwarded on the #LLC# layer.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_QoS_G_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the QoS_G_U area.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ULStreamingPktForwarded
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink streaming packets forwarded.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ULInteractivePktForwarded
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink interactive packets forwarded.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ULConversationalPktForwarded
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink conversational packets forwarded.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ULBackgroundPktForwarded
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of uplink background packets forwarded.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_QoS_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the QoS_U area.

EntityDef.name: QoS.GuaranteedBitRateDowngrades.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times SGSN has failed to reserve Guaranteed Bit Rate resources for traffic class conversational or streaming. In case of streaming, traffic class might have been downgraded to interactive.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActInteractivePdpContext.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# interactive.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActInteractivePdpContext.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with interactive #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# interactive class, or when the #MS# requests subscribed #QoS# which is interactive

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLConversationalPktDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink conversational packets discarded through policing.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLInteractivePktForwarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink interactive packets forwarded on the #GTP-U# layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ConversationalAttRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) attempts for QoS conversational.

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActStreamingPdpContext.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with streaming #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# streaming class.

EntityDef.name: QoS.StreamingReSentRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of re-sent Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment for QoS streaming.

EntityDef.name: QoS.BackgroundSuccRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment responses for QoS Background.

EntityDef.name: QoS.BackgroundAttRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment attempts for QoS Background.

EntityDef.name: QoS.ConversationalSuccRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment responses for QoS conversational.

EntityDef.name: QoS.StreamingSuccRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment responses for QoS streaming.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLConversationalPktForwarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink conversational packets forwarded on the GTP-U layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLBackgroundPktForwarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink background packets forwarded on the #GTP-U# layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.InteractiveAttRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) attempts for QoS Interactive.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLBackgroundPktDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink background packets discarded at policing functionality.

EntityDef.name: QoS.StreamingAttRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) attempts for QoS Streaming.

EntityDef.name: QoS.AttActConversationalPdpContext.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #PDP# context activation procedures with conversational #PDP# context. The counter is incremented when the #MS# requests the #QoS# conversational class.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActStreamingPdpContext.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# streaming.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLStreamingPktDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink streaming packets discarded at policing functionality.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLInteractivePktDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink interactive packets discarded at policing functionality.

EntityDef.name: QoS.DLStreamingPktForwarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of downlink streaming packets forwarded on the #GTP-U# layer.

EntityDef.name: QoS.NbrActConversationalPdpContext.U
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently active #PDP# contexts with #QoS# conversational.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.InteractiveSuccRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment responses for QoS Interactive.

EntityDef.name: QoS.GuaranteedBitRateAttempts.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times SGSN has attempted to reserve Guaranteed Bit Rate resources for traffic class conversational or streaming.

EntityDef.name: QoS.CurrentGuaranteedBitRate.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the current aggregated Guaranteed Bit Rate (UL+DL) for the node, related to traffic class conversational and streaming.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1024; Note, if supervision is activated the operator should use following value: 90% of the configured Guaranteed Bit Rate limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 1000; Note, if supervision is activated the operator should use following value: 85% of the configured Guaranteed Bit Rate limit

EntityDef.name: QoS.InteractiveReSentRabAss.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of re-sent Radio Access Bearer (RAB) assignment for QoS interactive. Modify RAB is not counted. When a fallback occurs the ReSent counter for the new class shall be updated.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_RANAP_RNC
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the RANAP_RNC area.

EntityDef.name: RNC.ranapRncInitiatedResetResource
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of incoming Reset Resource messages per #RNC#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SCTPUser
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SCTPUser area. The values for the measurement types in this group are collected from several PIUs or VMs and a value is the summary of all contributors. After a PIU or VM restart, the contributing measurement type values stored on the affected PIU or VM are lost. Therefore, measurement types can have lower values after a PIU or VM restart.

EntityDef.name: sctpCongestionIndReceived
