EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Congestion Indication primitive has been received from the #SCTP# to indicate that the remote endpoint is inaccessible due to failure or congestion. #SCTP# user traffic cannot be sent to this remote endpoint for the moment.

EntityDef.name: sctpCommLostIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Lost Indication primitive has been received from the #SCTP# to inform when the #SCTP# lost communication with an endpoint completely or detected an abort or a shutdown operation from the remote endpoint.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssociateReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user tried to establish an association by sending the #SCTP# Association Request primitive.

EntityDef.name: sctpMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #SCTP# user messages received from the remote endpoint.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssocReestablishmentAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SCTP association reestablishment attempts on the S1-MME and SBc interfaces. The number of reestablishment attempts are calculated per SctpUserId, that is, per interface. Also see counters sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccLocal and sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccRemote.

EntityDef.name: sctpErrResultWouldBlockReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user failed to send a primitive due to a blocked #SCTP#. The #SCTP# is blocked due to high load.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssociateConfReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Association Confirmation primitive has been received from #SCTP# to confirm that the #SCTP# tried to establish the association earlier requested by the #SCTP# user.

EntityDef.name: sctpOlpAbortExistingAssoc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times an existing #SCTP# association is aborted due to high CPU load.

EntityDef.name: sctpSetUlpKeyFail
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user failed to set the #ulpKey# parameter for one #SCTP# association because sending the #SCTP# Set ULP Key primitive failed.

EntityDef.name: sctpCommErrorIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Error Indication primitive has been received from the #SCTP# to indicate that the #SCTP# received an error chunk from its remote endpoint and decided to notify the #SCTP# user.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccRemote
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful SCTP association reestablishment attempts on the S1-MME and SBc interfaces with the remote node, eNodeB or CBC, as the source of the establishment of the SCTP association. This case occurs when both SGSN-MME and the remote node tries to reestablish the association, and as SGSN-MME on the S1-MME and SBc interfaces acts as server, the SCTP association established from the remote node will be preferred. The number of successful reestablishment attempts are calculated per SctpUserId, that is, per interface. Also see counters sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccLocal and sctpAssocReestablishmentAtt.

EntityDef.name: sctpErrResultReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user failed to send a primitive due to various #SCTP# reasons. The counter is not incremented for the reason of high CPU load. Primitives that are blocked due to high CPU load have the counter ctpErrResultWouldBlockReceived incremented.

EntityDef.name: sctpSetUlpKeyAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user tried to set the #ulpKey# parameter for one #SCTP# association by sending the #SCTP# Set ULP Key primitive.

EntityDef.name: sctpMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #SCTP# user messages sent to the remote endpoint.

EntityDef.name: sctpAbortReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# user requested the #SCTP# to close an association to a remote endpoint by sending the #SCTP# Abort Request primitive.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssocRestartIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Association Restart Indication primitive has been received from the #SCTP# to indicate that the #SCTP# has detected that the remote endpoint restarted the association.

EntityDef.name: sctpOlpAbortNewAssoc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a newly established #SCTP# association is aborted due to high CPU load.

EntityDef.name: sctpSendFailureIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Failure Indication primitive has been received from the #SCTP# to indicate that the #SCTP# has encountered a problem when trying to send a primitive, earlier requested by the #SCTP# user.

EntityDef.name: sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccLocal
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful SCTP association reestablishment attempts on the S1-MME and SBc interfaces with the MME as the source of the establishment of the SCTP association. The number of successful reestablishment attempts are calculated per SctpUserId, that is, per interface. Also see counters sctpAssocReestablishmentSuccRemote and sctpAssocReestablishmentAtt.

EntityDef.name: sctpCommUpIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Up Indication primitive is received by the #SCTP# user to indicate when the #SCTP# became ready to send or receive #SCTP# User messages, or when a lost communication to a remote endpoint was restored.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SGs
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SGs area.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.UplinkUnitdata.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Uplink Unitdata messages sent to the #MSC/VLR# from the #MME# on the SGs interface. This counter is incremented each time an Uplink Unitdata messages is sent to an #MSC/VLR#.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.PagingCsRestoration.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGs Paging messages with "CS Restoration Indicator" received over the SGs interface. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives an SGs Paging message with "CS Restoration Indicator" over the SGs interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.DownlinkUnitdata.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink Unitdata messages sent from the #MSC/VLR# to the #MME# on the SGs interface. This counter is incremented each time a Downlink Unitdata messages is received from an #MSC/VLR#.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.CsfbPagingIgnoredDueToCSCallToSMSOnlyUE.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of the ignored SGsAP Paging Request messages indicating CS call from the MSC over the SGs interface, because either the UE is an SMS-only device or the UE is given the SMS-only capability by the MME. This counter is incremented each time when the MME receives the SGsAP Paging Request messages indicating CS call from MSC but does not respond to the MSC because either the UE is an SMS-only device or the UE is given the SMS-only capability by the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.MoCsfbIndication.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGsAP-MO-CSFB-INDICATION messages on the SGs interface. This counter is incremented each time an SGsAP-MO-CSFB-INDICATION message is sent to an MSC/VLR.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgs.PagingReq.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGsAP Paging Request received over the SGs interface. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives an SGsAP Paging Request.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SMS_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SMS_G area.

EntityDef.name: SMS.SuccMoPS.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# #SMS# mobile originating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMoPSUscDiscarded.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of PS Mobile Originating SMS messages that are discarded by UE Signaling Control feature. Incremented when SGSN is activated, and when it identifies the message as a SMS-SUBMIT TPDU message from an UE during the control period. Applies only to GSM access systems.

EntityDef.name: SMS.SuccMtPS.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# #SMS# mobile terminating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMtPS.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #PS# #SMS# mobile terminating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.UnsuccMoPSRpErrorCC8.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of RP-ERROR messages caused by Operator Determined Barring (ODB) for MO-SMS service. The cause code carried in the RP-ERROR messages is #8 Operator determined barring.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMoPS.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #PS# #SMS# mobile originating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SMS_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SMS_U area.

EntityDef.name: SMS.SuccMtPS.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# #SMS# mobile terminating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMoPSUscDiscarded.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of PS Mobile Originating SMS messages that are discarded by UE Signaling Control feature. Incremented when SGSN is activated, and when it identifies the message as a SMS-SUBMIT TPDU message from an UE during the control period. Applies only to WCDMA access systems.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMoPS.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #PS# #SMS# mobile originating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.AttMtPS.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #PS# #SMS# mobile terminating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SMS.UnsuccMoPSRpErrorCC8.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of RP-ERROR messages caused by Operator Determined Barring (ODB) for MO-SMS service. The cause code carried in the RP-ERROR messages is #8 Operator determined barring.

EntityDef.name: SMS.SuccMoPS.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #PS# #SMS# mobile originating attempts.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SNDCP
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SNDCP area.

EntityDef.name: uplinkSndcpNpduSentV42bisDecomp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of incoming #N-PDUs# received and decompressed by the #SNDCP# layer.

EntityDef.name: uplinkSndcpOctetSentV42bisDecomp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of octets in incoming #N-PDUs# received and decompressed by the #SNDCP# layer. While the counter counts octets, the measurement unit of reported value is KOctets (1024 octets).

EntityDef.name: uplinkSndcpOctetReceivedMode
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of octets in incoming #N-PDUs# received by the #SNDCP# layer. While the counter counts octets, the measurement unit of reported value is KOctets (1024 octets).

EntityDef.name: downlinkSndcpNpduSentV42bisComp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of outgoing #N-PDUs# compressed and sent by the #SNDCP# layer.

EntityDef.name: downlinkSndcpOctetSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of octets in outgoing #N-PDUs# sent by the #SNDCP# layer. While the counter counts octets, the measurement unit of reported value is KOctets (1024 octets).

EntityDef.name: downlinkSndcpNpduSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of outgoing #N-PDUs# sent by the #SNDCP# layer.

EntityDef.name: uplinkSndcpNpduReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of incoming #N-PDUs# received by the #SNDCP#.

EntityDef.name: downlinkSndcpOctetSentV42bisComp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of octets in outgoing #N-PDUs# compressed and sent by the #SNDCP# layer. While the counter counts octets, the measurement unit of reported value is KOctets (1024 octets).

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_NarrowbandLink
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_NarrowbandLink area.

EntityDef.name: ss7Mtpl2LinkLoadTransmit
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the bandwidth usage (in percent) for the #MTP-L2# transmit link. The value is a mean value of the link load since the last reading of the gauge value.

EntityDef.name: ss7SLFailureNb
EntityDef.description: #SL# failure is detected on a narrowband link. This counter shows the index for where the link is connected.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageReceivedPerLinkNb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #MSU# messages received on this narrowband link. The maximum read interval is 1800 sec.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: @150 bytes packet size: (data rate in bit per second / (8*150) ) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageSentPerLinkNb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #MSU# messages sent on this narrowband link. The maximum read interval is 1800 sec.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: @150 bytes packet size: (data rate in bit per second / (8*150) ) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7OctetsSentPerLinkNb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of KB sent by MTP-L3 on a narrowband link. The maximum read interval is 10800 sec.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: (data rate in bit per second / (8*1024) ) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7OctetsReceivedPerLinkNb
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of KB received by MTP-L3 on a narrowband link. The maximum read interval is 10800 sec.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: (data rate in bit per second / (8*1024) ) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7SLRestorationNb
EntityDef.description: #SL# restoration has occurred on a narrowband link. The counter shows the index for where the link is connected.

EntityDef.name: ss7Mtpl2LinkLoadReceive
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the bandwidth usage (in percent) for the #MTP-L2# receive link. The value is a mean value of the link load since the last reading of the gauge value.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7M3uaRemoteSp
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_RemoteSP area.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspdnAckMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #ASPDN# Acknowledge message has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer to acknowledge an #ASPDN# message earlier sent from this #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7OctetsSentToRemoteSp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of KB sent to remote Signaling Process. The maximum read interval is 3600 sec.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 90% of the configured association bandwidth. If the calculated value equals 0, the level should be set to 1.
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 0. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 80% of the configured association bandwidth.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: (bandwidth in bit per second / (8*1024)) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspacAckMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #ASPAC# Acknowledge message has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer to acknowledge an #ASPAC# message earlier sent from this #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDavaMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DAVA# message has been sent from #M3UA# #ASP# or IP Signaling Process in response to a #DAUD# message. #SGSN# does not support being #SGP#, so this counter should always be 0.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDunaMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DUNA# message has been received from the Remote #SGP# to inform that one or more #SS7# destinations are unreachable.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDavaMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DAVA# message has been received from the Remote #SGP# to inform that one or more #SS7# destinations are available.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpShutdownReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# tried to close an association by sending the #SCTP# Shutdown Request message.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpCommUpReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Up Indication message is received by #M3UA# to indicate when #SCTP# became ready to send or receive #M3UA# messages, or when a lost communication to an endpoint was restored.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaErrorMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# Error message has been sent from #M3UA# to inform the Remote Signaling Process of an error event associated with an incoming message (for example Invalid Parameter Value).

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspiaMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #ASPIA# has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer, which is a request for #M3UA# to take the Signaling Process from state Active to state Inactive.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspiaAckMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #ASPIA# Acknowledge message has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer to acknowledge an #ASPIA# message earlier sent from this #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspacMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested the remote Signaling Process (SP) to move from state Inactive to state Active by sending the #ASPAC# message.

EntityDef.name: ss7OctetsReceivedFromRemoteSp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of KB received from remote Signaling Process. The maximum read interval is 3600 sec.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 90% of the configured association bandwidth. If the calculated value equals 0, the level should be set to 1.
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 0. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 80% of the configured association bandwidth.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: (bandwidth in bit per second / (8*1024)) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaErrorMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# Error message has been received from the Remote Signaling Process to inform #M3UA# of an error event associated with an incoming message (for example Invalid Parameter Value).

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDaudMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DAUD# message has been sent from #M3UA# #ASP# to request #SS7# destination audit for an #SG#/#SGP#.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspdnAckMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# acknowledged a received #ASPDN# message by sending an #ASPDN# Acknowledge message to the remote #M3UA# peer.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspupMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested the remote Signaling Process to move from state Down to state Inactive by sending the #ASPUP# message.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpStatusConfReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Status Confirmation message has been received from #SCTP# to inform #M3UA# about the current status of the endpoint, requested earlier by #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpAssociateConfReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Association Confirmation message has been received from #SCTP# to confirm that the #SCTP# tried to establish the association earlier requested by M3UA.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDrstMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DRST# message has been sent from #SG# to inform that one or more #SS7# destinations are now restricted. #SGSN# does not support acting as an #SGP#, so the counter should always be 0.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDunaMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DUNA# message has been sent from #M3UA# #ASP#/#IPSP# in response to a #DAUD# message. #SGSN# does not support being #SGP#, so this counter should always be 0.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpStatusReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested that the #SCTP# should return the current status of the endpoint by sending the #SCTP# Status Request message.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpCommLostIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Lost Indication message has been received from #SCTP# to inform when #SCTP# lost communication with an endpoint completely or detected an abort or a shutdown operation from the endpoint.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpCommErrorIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Communication Error Indication message has been received from #SCTP# to indicate that #SCTP# received an Error chunk from its peer and decided to notify #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDrstMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DRST# message has been received from the #SG# to inform that one or more #SS7# destinations are restricted.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpAbortReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested that the #SCTP# should close an association by sending the #SCTP# Abort Request message.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspdnMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested the remote Signaling Processor to move from state Inactive to state Down by sending the #ASPDN# message.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaNotifyMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #NTFY# message has been received from the Remote #SGP#/#IPSP# to inform that the state of the remote #AS# has been changed.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspacAckMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# acknowledged a received #ASPAC# message by sending an #ASPAC# Acknowledge message to the remote #M3UA# peer.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageReceivedFromRemoteSp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #MSUs# received from remote Signaling Process. The maximum read interval is 900 sec.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 90% of the configured association bandwidth @ 150 byte packet size [packets]. If the calculated value equals 0, the level should be set to 1.
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 0. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 80% of the configured association bandwidth @ 150 byte packet size [packets].
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: @150 bytes packet size (bandwidth in bit per second / (8*150)) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7RemoteSpAvlForUP
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Remote Signaling Process has become available for User Part traffic (association moved to active state).

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDaudMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DAUD# message has been received from #ASP# to request #SS7# destination audit for the #SG#/#SGP#. #SGSN# does not support being an #SGP#, so this counter should always be 0.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspiaMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# requested the remote Signaling Process to move from state Active to state Inactive by sending the #ASPIA# message.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpAssociateReqSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# tried to establish an association by sending the #SCTP# Association Request message.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspdnMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #ASPDN# has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer, which is a request for #M3UA# to take the Signaling Process from state Inactive to state Down.

EntityDef.name: ss7RemoteSpUnavlForUP
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Remote Signaling Process has become unavailable for User Part traffic (association moved from active state).

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaNotifyMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #NTFY# message has been sent from #M3UA#/#IPSP# to inform all remote #ASPs# that the state of this #AS# has changed.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspupMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #ASPUP# has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer, which is a request to the #M3UA# to take the Signaling Process from state Down to state Inactive.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDupuMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DUPU# message has been sent from an #SGP# to inform that a remote peer #MTP-L3# User Part at an #SS7# node is unavailable. #SGSN# does not support being #SGP#, so this counter should always be 0.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaDupuMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #M3UA# #DUPU# message has been received from the Remote #SGP# to inform that a remote peer #MTP-L3# User Part at an #SS7# node is unavailable.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpShutdownConfReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Shutdown Confirmation message has been received from #SCTP# to confirm that the shutdown process, earlier requested from #M3UA#, has started successfully or not.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpAssocRestartIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Association Restart Indication message has been received from #SCTP# to indicate that the #SCTP# has detected that the remote peer restarted the association.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspupAckMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# acknowledged a received #ASPUP# message by sending an #ASPUP# Acknowledge message to the remote #M3UA# peer.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspupAckMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #ASPUP# Acknowledge message has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer to acknowledge an #ASPUP# message earlier sent from this #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageSentToRemoteSp
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #MSUs# sent to remote Signaling Process. The maximum read interval is 900 sec.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 90% of the configured association bandwidth @ 150 byte packet size [packets]. If the calculated value equals 0, the level should be set to 1.
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: 0. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 80% of the configured association bandwidth @ 150 byte packet size [packets].
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: @150 bytes packet size (bandwidth in bit per second / (8*150)) * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspacMessageReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #ASPAC# has been received from the remote #M3UA# peer, which is a request for #M3UA# to take the Signaling Process from state Inactive to state Active.

EntityDef.name: ss7M3uaAspiaAckMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times #M3UA# acknowledged a received #ASPIA# message by sending an #ASPIA# Acknowledge message to the remote #M3UA# peer.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpCongestionIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Congestion Indication message has been received from #SCTP# to indicate that the remote Signaling Process is inaccessible due to failure or congestion. #M3UA# traffic cannot be sent to this destination for the moment.

EntityDef.name: ss7SctpFailureIndReceived
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the #SCTP# Failure Indication message has been received from #SCTP# to indicate that #SCTP# has encountered a problem when trying to send a message, earlier requested by #M3UA#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7TcapSubsystem
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_Ss7TcapSubsystem area.

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfRunDialPerSsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of running #TCAP# dialogues per #SSN#.

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfRunOpPerSsn
EntityDef.description: The number of running #TCAP# operations per #SSN#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Route
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Route area.

EntityDef.name: ss7RouteUnavailable
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a route was unavailable for user part traffic.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Linkset
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Linkset area.

EntityDef.name: ss7LinkSetUnavailable
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a link set was unavailable for user part traffic.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Routeset
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_Ss7Mtpl3Routeset area.

EntityDef.name: ss7RouteSetUnavailable
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times a route set was unavailable for user part traffic (no route is available for the destination).

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_Ss7LocalSignalingPoint
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_Ss7LocalSignalingPoint area.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermXUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #XUDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigXUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #XUDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermLUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #LUDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #UDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #UDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #UDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermXUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #XUDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigXUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #XUDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfIncSegMes
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of incoming segmented messages.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigLUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #LUDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermUDTS
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #UDTS# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermLUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of terminated #LUDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigLUDT
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of originated #LUDT# messages per local signaling point.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_SgsnFunction
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_SgsnFunction area.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageDiscardedOPCScreening
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded #MSU# packets received. The packets are discarded by the #OPC# screening when the received OPC is not accepted. The ss7M3MSUDiscardedOPCScreening event includes both the received #OPC# and the adjacent #DPC#.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: 1. Note that when supervision is activated, use a value that is 1% of the configured signaling link or the association bandwidth @ 150 byte packet size [packets]. If the calculated value equals 0, set the level to 1.
EntityDef.supervisionEquation: events per second * supervision interval in seconds

EntityDef.name: ss7SPInaccess
EntityDef.description: The adjacent #SP# is inaccessible.

EntityDef.name: ss7MSUDiscardError
EntityDef.description: The #MSU# is discarded due to routing data error. The message could not be routed and was therefore discarded.;The standard routing label contains the destination and originating point of the message, along with the signaling link selection (used for selecting which signaling link to use). One of these fields was invalid in the message received from the user part.;Inspection of the log file may show the content of the invalid message field, received from the MTP-L3 user, and clarify the cause of the error.

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfRunDialTot
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of running dialogues.

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfRunOpTot
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of running operations.

EntityDef.name: ss7TCMessageSent
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of Transaction Capability (TC) messages sent by the stack.

EntityDef.name: ss7ProtocolErrorComp
EntityDef.description: A protocol error is detected in component portion.

EntityDef.name: ss7ProtocolErrorTraD
EntityDef.description: A protocol error has occurred, since P-abort is unrecognized message type.

EntityDef.name: ss7ProtocolErrorTraA
EntityDef.description: A protocol error has occurred, since P-abort is unrecognized #TID#.

EntityDef.name: ss7TCMessageReceive
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of Transaction Capability (TC) messages received by the stack.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SS7_U_Ss7LocalSignalingPoint
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SS7_U_Ss7LocalSignalingPoint area.

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermCR
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Request messages received. It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigCR
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of sent Connection Request messages. It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigRLSD
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Released messages sent. It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermRLSD
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Released messages received. It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageOrigDT1
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Data Form 1 messages sent (Connection Oriented data). It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7MessageTermDT1
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Data Form 1 messages received (Connection Oriented data). It is registered for SGSN (G) if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is > 0 for any local SAP instance, but it is not applicable for SGSN (G).

EntityDef.name: ss7NoOfCurrRunConnTot
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of currently running #SCCP# connections. The gauge is only applicable for an #SGSN# with #WCDMA# access, but is registered also for an SGSN without WCDMA access if the NumberOfConnections SCCP parameter is greater than zero for any local SAP instance.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_SgsnFunction
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_SgsnFunction area.

EntityDef.name: attAuthInSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication procedures that are started within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: succAuthInSgsn
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful authentication procedures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.IdentificationSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Identification procedures initiated by the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.TauInterIratAuthFailMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication reject messages sent by the MME during the inter-node ISC TAU procedures (with RAT change). The authentication rejection due to (T3460) timeout is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AuthFailUe.20.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 20 (MAC failure). The counter is increased whenever the UE detects an incorrect authentication parameter in the Authentication Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.TauInterAuthFailMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Authentication Reject messages sent by the MME during the Inter-MME TAU procedure. The authentication rejection due to timeout (T3460) is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.IdentificationAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Identification Request procedures initiated by the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.TauIntraIratAuthFailMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication reject messages sent by the MME during the intra-node ISC TAU procedures (with RAT change). The authentication rejection due to (T3460) timeout is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AttSecModeProcsMmeUsim
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Security Mode Control procedures started within this #MME# area, for a subscriber using a #USIM#. The resending of the Security Mode Command message is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AuthFailUe.26.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 26 (Non-EPS authentication unacceptable). The counter is increased whenever the UE detects an incorrect authentication parameter in the Authentication Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.SuccAuthProcsMmeUsim
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #EPS# authentication challenges that are started within this #MME# area for a subscriber using a #USIM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AuthFailUe.21.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 21 (Sync failure). The counter is increased whenever the UE detects an incorrect SQN or a SQN is out of range.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AttAuthProcsMmeUsim
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #EPS# authentication challenges that are started within this #MME# area for a subscriber using a #USIM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AttachAuthFailMme.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Authentication Reject messages sent by the MME during the Attach procedure. The authentication rejection due to timeout (T3460) is not counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AucInfoAnsFail.5001
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Authentication Information Retrieval procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5001. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Authentication Information Answer message with cause code 5001 (User unknown).

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.IdentityAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Identity Request procedures initiated by the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AucInfoAnsFail.5420
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of failed Authentication Information Retrieval procedures over the S6a interface with cause code 5420. The counter is increased whenever the MME receives an Authentication Information Answer message with cause code 5420 (Unknown EPS subscription).

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.SuccSecModeProcsMmeUsim
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Security Mode Control procedures within this #MME# area, for a subscriber using a #USIM#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.IdentitySucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Identity procedures initiated by the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_G area.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccIdentityReqImsi.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed Identity Request procedures initiated by this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SEC.RecPOAuthFailSgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of ciphering and Authentication failures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccContextRequestToPsgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully replied #SGSN# Context Request messages or Context Request messages that were sent to a partner (previous) #SGSN#/MME. It is incremented at receipt of the "#SGSN# Context Response" message or "Context Response" message from the previous #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttAuthProcsSgsnUsim.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication procedures that are started within this #SGSN# area for a subscriber using a #USIM#. Valid for #UMTS# subscribers located within #GSM# Access Systems.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttContextRequestToPsgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #SGSN# Context Request messages or Context Request messages sent to a partner (previous) #SGSN#/MME for subscribers registering afresh in this #SGSN#. Resendings are also counted. It is incremented at transmission of the "#SGSN# Context Request" message or "Context Request" message to the previous #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttContextRequestFromPsgsn.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGSN Context Request messages or Context Request messages received from a partner (new) SGSN/MME for a subscriber de-registering from this SGSN. It is incremented at receipt of the "#SGSN# Context Request" message or "Context Request" message from the new #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccAuthProcsSgsnSim.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful authentication procedures within this #SGSN# area, for a subscriber using a #SIM#. Valid for subscribers (#GSM# and #UMTS#) located within #GSM# Access System.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttAuthProcsSgsnSim.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication procedures that are started within this #SGSN# area for a subscriber using a #SIM#. Valid for subscribers (#GSM# and #UMTS#) located within #GSM# Access System.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccAuthProcsSgsnUsim.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful authentication procedures within this #SGSN# area, for a subscriber using a #USIM#. Valid for #UMTS# subscribers located within #GSM# Access Systems.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttIdentityReqImsi.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Identity Request procedures initiated by this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_Hlr
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_Hlr area.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttReqAuthSetsSentToHlrBySGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #MAP# requests for authentication sets sent to the #HLR# by SGSN. Note! All #MAP# versions are counted.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccReqAuthSetsSentToHlrBySGSN
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #MAP# requests for authentication sets that were sent to the #HLR#. Note! All #MAP# versions are counted.

EntityDef.name: SEC.emptyResponsesForAuthSetsFromHlr
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of empty responses to the #MAP# request for authentication sets that were sent to the #HLR#. Note! All #MAP# versions are counted.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_Hss
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_Hss area.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AuthInfoHssSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful S6a/S6d Authentication Information Retrieval procedures in the SGSN/MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SEC.AuthInfoHssAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S6a/S6d Authentication Information Retrieval procedures in the SGSN/MME.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_UeSecurity_U
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the UeSecurity_U area.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttContextRequestToPsgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #SGSN# context requests or context requests sent to a partner (previous) #SGSN#/MME for subscribers registering afresh in this #SGSN#. Resendings are also counted. It is incremented at transmission of the "#SGSN# Context Request" message or "Context Request" message to the previous #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccAuthProcsSgsnUsim.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful authentication procedures within this #SGSN# area, for a subscriber using a #USIM#. Valid for #UMTS# subscribers located within #UMTS# Access Systems.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccContextRequestToPsgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully replied #SGSN# context requests or context requests that were sent to a partner (previous) #SGSN#/MME. It is incremented at receipt of the "#SGSN# Context Response" message or "Context Response" message from the previous #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccSecMode
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful security mode procedures. The security mode command response from #MS# starts the uplink integrity protection (and possible ciphering). All following messages sent from the MS are integrity protected (and possibly ciphered).

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccIdentityReqImsi.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed Identity Request procedures initiated by this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SEC.RecPOAuthFailSgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of ciphering and Authentication failures within this #SGSN# area.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttIdentityReqImsi.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Identity Request procedures initiated by this #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttSecMode
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of security mode control procedures started by the #SGSN#.

EntityDef.name: SEC.SuccAuthProcsSgsnSim.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful authentication procedures within this #SGSN# area, for a subscriber using a #SIM#. Valid for #GSM# subscribers located within #UMTS# Access System.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttContextRequestFromPsgsn.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGSN context requests or context requests received from a partner (new) SGSN/MME for a subscriber de-registering from this SGSN. It is incremented at receipt of the "#SGSN# Context Request" message or "Context Request" message from the new #SGSN#/MME.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttAuthProcsSgsnUsim.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication procedures that are started within this #SGSN# area for a subscriber using a #USIM#. Valid for #UMTS# subscribers located within #UMTS# Access Systems.

EntityDef.name: SEC.AttAuthProcsSgsnSim.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication procedures that are started within this #SGSN# area for a subscriber using a #SIM#. Valid for #GSM# subscribers located within #UMTS# Access System.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Session_HO
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Session_HO area.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccInvalidEmcPgwId.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) emergency PDN handovers from non-3GPP access to LTE. This counter is incremented when the emergency PGW identity is missing or invalid in the EPS subscription data.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccCtxtNotFound.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to WCDMA. This counter is increased when the PGW rejects the Create Session Request with cause code #64 (Context Not Found).

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xSucc.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to WCDMA.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccCtxtNotFound.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to LTE. This counter is increased when the PGW rejects the Create Session Request with cause code #64 (Context Not Found).

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xAtt.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to WCDMA.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccInvalidPgwId.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to LTE. This counter is increased when the PGW identity is missing or invalid in the EPS subscription data.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccEmcCtxtNotFound.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) emergency PDN handovers from non-3GPP access to LTE. This counter is incremented when the emergency PGW rejects the Create Session Request with the cause code #64 (Context Not Found).

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access.

EntityDef.name: VS.HO.S2xUnsuccInvalidPgwId.U
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful S2x-based (without optimizations) handovers from non-3GPP access to WCDMA. This counter is increased when the PGW identity is missing or invalid in the EPS subscription data.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Session_DiscardedMessages_G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Session_DiscardedMessages_G area.

EntityDef.name: discardedSessionMgmnt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded session management messages on #DP# level, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements.

EntityDef.name: discardedSessionMgmntPdpActivation
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of discarded session management messages of PDP context activation, due to overload protection or incorrect information elements.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Session_SM_RA
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Session_SM_RA area.

EntityDef.name: SM.NbrActPdpContextRa
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of active PDP contexts per RA within an SGSN. The gauge is incremented when a new PDP context is activated and decremented when a PDP context is deactivated. For an RA Update, the old RA indexed gauge is decremented and the new RA indexed gauge is incremented.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Session_SM_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Session_SM_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraOutForEndcSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) information with "outside" flag used for EN-DC is sent. The counter is incremented each time the PRA information is included in a message sent to the SGW.

EntityDef.name: SM.ActDefaultBearerRedirectRejectedByImeiTac.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of APN redirections that is rejected by the APN Redirection criteria. This criteria is specified based on the IMEI-TAC of the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ErabModConfirm.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RAB Modification Confirm messages sent from the #MME# to the #eNodeB# over the S1 interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NbrActBearer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active EPS bearers, that is, the gauge is incremented when a new EPS bearer is activated and decremented when an EPS bearer is deactivated. Note:Both default and dedicated bearers are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDedicatedBearerEmcAtt.E
EntityDef.description: For each Create Bearer Request message sent on S11 to the #MME# for IMS emergency service, this counter is incremented with the number of bearers included in the request. Note: The Create Bearer Request message included in the Create Session Response message sent to the MME is also taken into calculation.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DdnMessage.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink Data Notification messages received by the MME from the SGW. This counter is incremented when the MME receives the Downlink Data Notification message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NrUsageReportsSentIrSgw.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Secondary RAT Usage Data Reports sent from the MME to the SGW over the S11 interface or sent to the Target MME over the S10 interface with Intended Receiver SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NbrUeWithPraSessions.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of UEs with at least one active Presence Reporting Area (PRA) session. The gauge is incremented when the first PDN Connection for a UE activates a PRA session. The gauge is decremented when the last active PRA session for a UE is deactivated or the last PDN Connection with an active PRA session is removed.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.GbrDeactTimerStarted.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times that the S1TGBRBearerDeactivation timer is started in the MME to delay the deactivation of the GBR bearers when Timer-Based Deactivation of GBR Bearers is enabled.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDefaultS5S8BearerMmeSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Create Session Response messages with cause code 16 (Request accepted). The counter is increased whenever the MME receives this message from the SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NbrActDefaultBearerEmc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active default #EPS# bearers for #IMS# emergency service, that is, the gauge is incremented when a new default #EPS# bearer is activated for #IMS# Emergency Service and decremented when a default #EPS# bearer for #IMS# Emergency Service is deactivated.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.EsmDataTransportUplinkFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Esm Data Transport messages sent from the UE to MME, which MME has discarded. This counter is also incremented when a Control Plane Service Request message contains such an Esm Data Transport message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.S1RelAbnormalWithGBRBearer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of eNodeB-initiated S1 releases for UEs with GBR bearers when the S1 release cause is any category cause code, except the following cause codes: - USER_INACTIVITY - INTER_RAT_REDIRECTION - CS_FALLBACK_TRIGGERED - UE_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_PS_SERVICE - REDIRECTION_TOWARDS_1XRTT

EntityDef.name: SM.DeactEpsDedicatedBearerAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Dedicated Bearer Deactivation procedures attempted by the #MME#. The counter is not incremented when resending a Deactivate EPS Bearer Context Request to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DdnaMessageWithThrottling.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink Data Notification Acknowledge messages with DL low priority traffic Throttling IE sent from the MME to the SGW. This counter is incremented when a Downlink Data Notification Acknowledge message with DL low priority traffic Throttling IE is sent from the MME to the SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PdnConnRejectWithBackOffTimer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the SGSN-MME included a Back-Off time IE in the PDN Connectivity Reject message because of APN-based congestion. This applies for the standalone PDN Connectivity Request and the Attach procedures.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.EsmDataTransportUplinkAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Esm Data Transport messages sent from the UE to MME. This counter is also incremented when a Control Plane Service Request message contains an Esm Data Transport message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.GbrDeactTimerExpired.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times that the S1TGBRBearerDeactivation timer expires.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDedicatedEpsGbrBearerAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Dedicated Bearer Activation procedure attempts for GBR bearers between the MME and the UE. The counter is not incremented when resending an Activate Dedicated EPS Bearer Context Request for GBR bearers to the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NbrActBearerEmc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active #EPS# bearers established for #IMS# Emergency Service, that is, the gauge is incremented when a new #EPS# bearer is activated for #IMS# Emergency Service and decremented when an #EPS# bearer for #IMS# Emergency Service is deactivated. #Note:Both default and dedicated bearers for #IMS# Emergency Service are counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDedicatedEpsGbrBearerSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Dedicated Bearer Activation procedures for GBR bearers between the MME and the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDedicatedBearerFailFWA.E
EntityDef.description: For each Create Bearer Request message sent to the #MME#, this counter is incremented with the number of bearers, that were not activated, due to that the number of paging attempts is set to 0. Cause code 90 (Unable to page UE) is returned to the Serving Gateway.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PDNConnectivityUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of stand-alone PDN Connectivity Request messages discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDedicatedBearerFail.102
EntityDef.description: For each Create Bearer Request message sent to the #MME#, this counter is incremented with the number of bearers that were not activated because the UE was in suspend status, and the MME was unable to page the UE. A response with cause code 102 (Unable to page UE due to Suspension) is returned to the #SGW#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PDNConnectivityUscRejected.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of PDN Connectivity Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a PDN Connectivity Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NbrActDefaultBearer.E
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of active default #EPS# bearers, that is, the gauge is incremented when a new default #EPS# bearer is activated and decremented when a default #EPS# bearer is deactivated.
#Note: After a change to the #PDP# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #PDP# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the PDP capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the PDP capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.GbrDeactTimerCancelledDueToPaging.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times that the S1TGBRBearerDeactivation timer is cancelled due to paging triggered by downlink payload.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DeleteIndirectDataForwardingTunnelSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Delete Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Response messages. The counter is incremented when this message is received by the MME from the SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.UeRestorationUponGwRestarted.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of UEs for which the MME initiated Gateway Restoration procedures when the SGW or the PGW restarted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.SuccActBearer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed #EPS# Bearer Activation procedures. #Note:Only default bearer procedures are counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ModPGWInitBearerUpdateSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Bearer Modification procedures initiated by the #PDN# Gateway. The counter is incremented when the Update Bearer Response message is sent to the Serving Gateway. This message may contain multiple bearers. Each bearer with an indication of a successful bearer update is cumulated to the counter.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDedicatedBearerSucc.E
EntityDef.description: For each Create Bearer Request message sent on S11 to the #MME#, this counter is incremented with the number of successfully activated bearers included in the request.

EntityDef.name: SM.ActDefaultBearerRedirectToSubscribedDefaultApn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of APN redirections to the subscribed default APN per MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.SgwRelocationLinkDown.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of the MME-initiated SGW Relocations due to the S11 link failure.

EntityDef.name: SM.DeactEpsDedicatedBearerSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Dedicated Bearer Deactivation procedures initiated by the #MME#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraForEndcSuppressedIdleToConn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) Information used for EN-DC suppressed and not reported to the PGW when the UE turns to the connected state from the idle state, including timer cancellation because the PRA status is changed to the last reported PRA status again, UE turning to idle, PRA stopped by PGW or PDN disconnected.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.StaticSgwQuerySucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful queries in the local static table in the MME for an SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraInformationSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times Presence Reporting Area (PRA) Information is sent. This counter is incremented each time PRA Information is included in a message sent to SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDefaultBearerApnConverted.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of APN conversions in the default bearer activation procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NrUsageReportsReceived.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Secondary RAT Usage Data Reports received in the MME from the eNodeB over the S1 interface or received in the MME from a Source MME over the S10 interface. The counter is incremented if the NR Usage Data Reporting feature is active.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DelPdnHssPcscfInit.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of the Delete Session Request messages sent by the MME to delete the IMS PDN (or detach the UE if the deleted PDN is the last PDN of the UE) when the MME receives the Insert Subscriber Data Request message from the HSS. The Insert Subscriber Data Request message includes the IDR-Flags with the P-CSCF Restoration Request bit set.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActBearerNoIpv4.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed EPS Bearer Activation procedures with no IPv4 address in the PGW control plane or user plane. #Note: Both default bearer and dedicated bearer procedures are counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDefaultS5S8BearerMmeAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Create Session Request messages. The counter is increased whenever this message is sent from the MME to the SGW. The Create Session Request message might include one default bearer and multiple dedicated bearers.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateDedicatedBearerFail.87_90
EntityDef.description: For each Create Bearer Request message sent to the #MME#, this counter is incremented with the number of bearers, that were not activated, due to that the #UE# does not respond or due to that MME is unable to page the UE. A response with cause code 87 (UE not responding) or cause code 90 (Unable to page UE) is returned to the Serving Gateway.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.EsmDataTransportDownlink.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Esm Data Transport messages sent from MME to the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.SuccDeactBearerUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed #EPS# Bearer Deactivation procedures for both default and dedicated bearers.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDedicatedBearerEmcAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Dedicated Bearer Activation procedure attempts between the #MME# and the #UE# for #IMS# emergency service. The counter is not incremented when resending an Activate Dedicated EPS Bearer Context Request to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.AttDeactDefaultBearerDueToPgwResel.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of PDN reactivations triggered by the MME due to PGW reselection.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.RestorePDNConnAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Create Session Request messages sent to a new SGW attempting the GW restoration procedure triggered by the S11 link failure. The counter is not increased if the Create Session Request message is retransmitted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.UnsuccActBearerCC32_33.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful #EPS# bearer activation procedures for each #MME# that occur due to cause code 32 (Service option not supported), and cause code 33 (Requested Service Option not subscribed). The counter is incremented if the #PDN# Type is not supported or if the request is denied in the #MME# due to subscriber data restriction. #Note:Only default bearer procedures are counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateIndirectDataForwardingTunnelAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Create Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Request messages. The counter is incremented when this message is sent from the MME to the SGW excluding the retransmission.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDefaultBearerEmcHoSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed default #EPS# Bearer Activation procedures towards a #UE# for handover of #IMS# emergency service from non-3GPP access networks.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.GbrDeactTimerCancelled.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times that the S1TGBRBearerDeactivation timer is cancelled.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.AttDeactBearerUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #EPS# bearers, both default and dedicated, that are disconnected by the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: SM.ActDefaultBearerRedirectToSubscribedApn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of APN redirections to the subscribed APN of the lowest context ID per MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ExtraMBRWithPraInfoForEndc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) information used for EN-DC reporting through the extra Modify Bearer Request message. The counter is incremented when the MME sends an extra Modify Bearer Request and the message includes the PRA Information with the flag "inside" or "outside".

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.StaticPgwQuerySucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful queries in the local static table in the MME for a PGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DDNRecdInSR.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Downlink Data Notification messages received by the MME from the SGW in the UE-triggered Service Request procedure. This counter is incremented when the MME receives a Downlink Data Notification message while waiting for the S1-AP Initial Context Setup Response message.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.S1RelRadioLostWithGBRBearer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of eNodeB-initiated S1 releases due to the RADIO_CONNECTION_WITH_UE_LOST cause code for UEs with GBR bearers.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NotificationToUe.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Notification messages initiated by the MME to the UE. This counter is incremented each time the MME sends a Notification message to the UE. Resending of the Notification message is also counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.EmcPDNConnectivityUscDiscarded.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of stand-alone PDN Connectivity Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.CreateIndirectDataForwardingTunnelSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Create Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Response messages. The counter is incremented when this message is received by the MME from the SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.NrUsageReportsSentIrPgw.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Secondary RAT Usage Data Reports sent from the MME to the SGW over the S11 interface or sent to the Target MME over the S10 interface with Intended Receiver PGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ModPGWInitBearerUpdateFailFWA.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Bearer Modification procedures initiated by the PDN Gateway. This counter is incremented when the update bearer procedure is failed due to that the number of paging attempts is set to 0. Cause code 90 (Unable to page UE) is returned to Serving Gateway. This message may contain multiple bearers. Each bearer with an indication of an unsuccessful bearer update is cumulated to the counter.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.AttActBearer.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #EPS# Bearer Activation procedures. #Note:Only default bearer procedures are counted.Note#

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DeleteDedicatedBearerSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Dedicated Bearer Deactivation procedures sent to the Serving Gateway.

EntityDef.name: SM.ModEpsBearerAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #EPS# Bearer Modification procedures initiated by the #MME#. The counter is incremented when the Modify #EPS# Bearer Context Request message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: SM.ActDedicatedEpsBearerSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Dedicated Bearer Activation procedures between the #MME# and the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDefaultBearerEmcHoAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted default #EPS# Bearer activation procedures between the #MME# and a #UE# for handover of #IMS# emergency service from non-3GPP access networks. The counter is not incremented when the MME resends an Activate Default EPS Bearer Context Request to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DeleteDedicatedBearerAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Dedicated Bearer Deactivation procedures received from the Serving Gateway.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.MBReqWithDSTChangeForSR.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of DST change reporting through the Modify Bearer Request message in the service request procedure. The counter is incremented when the MME sends a Modify Bearer Request in the service request procedure and the message includes the UE Time Zone IE with the DST adjustment change but excludes the User Location Information IE. Note: The DST change reporting caused by the time zone configuration change is not recorded in this counter. For more information about time zone configuration, see LTE Time Zones (CLI).

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDedicatedBearerEmcSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Dedicated Bearer Activation procedures between the #MME# and the #UE# for #IMS# emergency service.

EntityDef.name: SM.ActDedicatedEpsBearerAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Dedicated Bearer Activation procedure attempts between the #MME# and the #UE#. The counter is not incremented when resending an Activate Dedicated EPS Bearer Context Request to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraOutForEndcSuppressedConn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) Information with the flag "outside" used for EN-DC suppressed and not reported to the PGW when the UE is in the ECM connected state, including timer cancellation because the PRA status is changed to "inside" again, UE turning to idle, PRA stopped by PGW or PDN disconnected.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.GbrDeactTimerRunningUeReturn.E
VS.SM.PdnConnectivityRejectDueToApnRestriction.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of standalone PDN Connectivity Request procedures that have been rejected due to APN restriction in the MME. The counter is incremented when a standalone PDN Connectivity Reject message is sent to the UE because the resolved APN is restricted from EPS services by local configuration in the MME.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ErabModIndication.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of E-RAB Modification Indication messages received in the #MME# from the #eNodeB# over the S1 interface. The counter is incremented when the message is received at the application level, before the Dual Connectivity Support feature state check.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraInForEndcSuppressedConn.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) Information with the flag "inside" used for EN-DC suppressed and not reported to the PGW when the UE is in the ECM connected state, including timer cancellation because the PRA status is changed to "outside" again, UE turning to idle, PRA stopped by PGW or PDN disconnected.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PraInForEndcSent.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of times the Presence Reporting Area (PRA) information with "inside" flag used for EN-DC is sent. The counter is incremented each time the PRA information is included in a message sent to the SGW.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.PDNConnectivityUscDetached.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of PDN Connectivity Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the detach action. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever a PDN Connectivity Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the detach action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.DeleteIndirectDataForwardingTunnelAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Delete Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Request messages. The counter is incremented when this message is sent from the MME to the SGW excluding the retransmission.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.ActDefaultEpsBearerSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Activate Default EPS Bearer Context Accept messages. The counter is increased whenever this message is sent from the UE to the MME.

EntityDef.name: SM.ModEpsBearerSucc
