The counter is incremented when a Paging Response is received from the UE and when a message the UE sends is regarded as a Paging Response during the Paging procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.M2M.PagingEdrxUeRej.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Paging procedures initiated for the UEs using Extended Idle Mode Discontinuous Reception (eDRX). The counter is incremented when the SGSN receives a Paging PS Reject message from the BSC.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_MM_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT_MM_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.14.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 14 (EPS services not allowed in this PLMN) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttachLapiRejected.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Attach Requests from the low access priority UE when the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control is activated.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauInterSucc.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Inter-MME #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. The counter is incremented when the Tracking Area Update Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.UnsuccAttachCC27_28.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with ESM cause codes 27 (Missing or unknown APN) and 28 (Unknown PDN type) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.7.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code code 7 (EPS services not allowed) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.5.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 5 (IMEI not accepted) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauInterAtt.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Inter-MME #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.8.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 8 (EPS services and non-EPS services not allowed) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttachNasCongestionControlRejected.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of reject messages with T3346 and EMM cause code 22 (Congestion) sent by the MME for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT. The MME sends the reject messages in response to Attach Request due to the NAS Level Mobility Management Congestion Control based on the UE priority.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.12.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 12 (Tracking area not allowed) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauPeriodicAtt.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Periodic #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.11.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code11 (PLMN not allowed) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttachUscDiscarded.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages discarded by the MME for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauPeriodicSucc.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Periodic #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. The counter is incremented when the Tracking Area Update Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauIntraAtt.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Periodic and Intra-MME #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. Both sent and resent messages from UEs are counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EmcAttachUscDiscarded.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages with emergency indication discarded by the MME for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT due to UE Signaling Control. The counter increases if a message is discarded when the UE Signaling Control rule is in measurement and control mode. Messages are discarded if the value of the ThresholdNumber parameter is exceeded within a measurement interval. The ThresholdNumber parameter is configured in the UE Signaling Control rule.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttAttach.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted E-UTRAN attach procedures initiated for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT within the MME's area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.UnsuccAttachCC32_33.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with ESM cause codes 32 (Service option not supported) and 33 (Requested service option not subscribed) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.SuccAttach.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed E-UTRAN attach procedures initiated for UEs using RAT type NB IoT within the MMEs area. This counter is incremented when the MME receives an Attach Complete message.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.NbrActAttachedSub.NB
EntityDef.description:
This measurement provides the number of currently attached UEs using RAT type NB-IoT within an MME. The gauge is incremented when the UE enters the EMM-REGISTERED state, for example, because of Attach or Inter-MME TA Update. The gauge is decremented when the UE leaves the EMM-REGISTERED state, for example, because of Detach or Implicit Detach.
#Note: After a change to the #SAU# capacity license value, a small restart must be performed to update the default alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels. Manually configured alarm-triggering and alarm-clearing levels are not updated by a small restart. After a #SAU# capacity license value change, manually configured levels can be updated only by using the set_pm_sup CLI command.Note#
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.15.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 15 (No suitable cells in tracking area) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttachUscRejected.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of Attach Request messages that are controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature with the reject action for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT. The counter applies only when the UE Signaling Control feature is activated in the Measurement and Control mode. The counter is increased whenever an Attach Request message is identified and controlled by UE Signaling Control with the reject action during a control period.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.19.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 19 (ESM failure) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.TauIntraSucc.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully performed Periodic and Intra-MME #TAU# procedures initiated in this #MME#, for #UE#s in Tracking Areas with #RAT# type #NB-IoT#. The counter is incremented when the Tracking Area Update Accept message is transmitted to the #UE#.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.17.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 17 (Network failure) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.6.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 6 (Illegal ME) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.NbrCsAttachedSub.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of SGs-associated UEs using RAT type NB-IoT within an MME. The SGs associations enable the UEs to perform the SMS service, the only CS service applicable for UEs using NB-IoT. The gauge is incremented at each successful initial UE registration towards an MSC/VLR. The gauge is decremented each time such a UE is IMSI detached.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.EpsAttachFail.13.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful EPS attach procedures that have failed with an EMM cause code 13 (Roaming not allowed in this tracking area) for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.RetrieveUeInformation.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Retrieve UE Information procedures performed over the S1-MME interface. This counter is incremented each time the MME receives a Retrieve UE Information message over the S1-MME interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.UnsuccAttach.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful E-UTRAN attach procedures initiated for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT within the MME's area. This counter is incremented whenever an Attach Reject message is sent except for being sent by the reject action of UE Signaling Control. Note: The number of successful attempts subtracted from the total number of attempts does not equal the number of unsuccessful attempts due to discarded messages, resent messages,and messages controlled by the UE Signaling Control feature.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MM.AttachDecorRerouteOut.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attach request procedures, where the MME sends a Reroute NAS Request message to the eNodeB for UEs using RAT type NB-IoT.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Pool_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Pool_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.Pool.AttachThrottlingAttachReservedNotUsed.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the amount of unused Reserved Attach Rate allowance, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitAttach parameter. The presented gauge is the aggregrated value over the latest 60 seconds.

EntityDef.name: VS.Pool.S6aBlockByThrottle.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of S6a messages blocked due to the Attach Throttling function during Pool Move. The counter is incremented when an S6a message is blocked because the number of messages under throttling control exceeds the available allowance. The available allowance for Pool Move procedure messages is the difference between the total Attach throttle allowance, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingAttachRateLimit parameter and the reserved allowance for E-UTRAN attach procedures, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitAttach parameter.

EntityDef.name: VS.Pool.AttachThrottlingNonReservedGranted.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Update Location Request (ULR) and Authentication Information Request (AIR) messages due to the Pool Move procedure that have been accepted by the Attach throttle using the non-reserved allowance. The non-reserved allowance is the difference between the total Attach throttle allowance, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingAttachRateLimit parameter, and the sum of the reserved allowances, specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitAttach and MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitGeoredRestore parameters. ULR and AIR messages accepted using the reserved Pool Move allowance specified by the MMEAttachThrottlingReservedLimitGeoredRestore parameter are not counted."

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_SM_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT SM area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.NbrActDefaultBearerNonIpScef.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active default EPS bearers with PDN type Non-IP over the SCEF. The gauge is incremented when a new default EPS bearer with PDN type Non-IP over the SCEF is activated. The gauge is decremented when an active default EPS bearer with PDN type Non-IP over SCEF is deactivated.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.NbrActDefaultBearerNonIp.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active default bearers with PDN type Non-IP for devices with RAT type NB-IoT. The gauge is incremented when a new default bearer with PDN type Non-IP is activated and decremented when an active default bearer with PDN type Non-IP is deactivated.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.SuccActDefaultBearerNonIp.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successfully completed default bearer activations with PDN type Non-IP for devices with RAT type NB-IoT. The counter is incremented when a default bearer with PDN type Non-IP is successfully activated.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.UeInitiatedPdnTransferCpToUpSwitchAtt.NB
EntityDef.description: This counter is used to count the number of times of attempt of UE initiated switch to UP data transport in ECM_CONNECTED mode.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.UeInitiatedPdnTransferCpToUpSwitchSucc.NB
EntityDef.description: This counter is used to count the number of times of successful procedures of UE initiated switch to UP data transport in ECM_CONNECTED mode.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SM.AttActDefaultBearerNonIp.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted default bearer activations with PDN type Non-IP for devices with RAT type NB-IoT. The counter is incremented when a default bearer with PDN type Non-IP attempts to activate.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LCS_E_ClientType
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LCS_E_ClientType area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MtlrCtSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful MT-LR procedures in the SGSN-MME. The procedure is considered successful when the E-SMLC has provided an estimation of the UE's location. This measurement is indexed by LCS Client Type. The indexed counter is incremented when the MME sends the Provide Subscriber Location Response message to the GMLC over the SLg interface with a successful result code. Note: The number of successful MT-LR procedures for queued emergency SLg sessions are also counted.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.MtlrCtAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted MT-LR procedures in the SGSN-MME. This measurement is indexed by LCS Client Type. The indexed counter is incremented when the MME receives a Provide Subscriber Location Request message from the GMLC over the SLg interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_LCS_E_EsmlcIp_ClientType
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the LCS_E_EsmlcIp_ClientType area.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestIpCtAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted location service request procedures in the SGSN-MME. This measurement is indexed by E-SMLC Primary IP Address and LCS Client Type. The indexed counter is incremented when the MME sends the LCS-AP Location Request message to the E-SMLC over the SLs interface.

EntityDef.name: VS.MM.LocationRequestIpCtSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful location service request procedures in the SGSN-MME. This measurement is indexed by E-SMLC Primary IP Address and LCS Client Type. The indexed counter is incremented when the MME receives the LCS-AP Location Response message from the E-SMLC over the SLs interface with a successful result code.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Sx_G
EntityDef.description:
This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Sx_G area.
Note:The Sx interface is named Smp interface since SGSN-MME 1.10. For backward compatibility, the name Sx is still kept in operation and maintenance related fields.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionTerminate.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Smp session termination procedures initiated by the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN sends a Credit-Control-Request message with the TERMINATION_REQUEST type.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionReauthSucc.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Smp session re-authorization from the SAPC to the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN sends a successful Re-Auth-Answer message.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionInitialSucc.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Smp session establishments in the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN receives a successful Credit-Control-Answer message with the INITIAL_REQUEST type.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionInitialAtt.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempts of Smp session establishment in the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN sends a Credit-Control-Request message with the INITIAL_REQUEST type.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SapcGwQuery.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number that the SGSN queries the GGSN/PGW address that is returned by the SAPC for PDP connections in the GSM network. The counter is incremented each time the SGSN attempts to query the GGSN/PGW address and the GGSN/PGW address from SAPC is available. For example, the SGSN selects the GGSN/PGW from SAPC to establish PDP connections during a primary PDP context activation procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionUpdateAtt.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Smp session update procedures initiated by the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN sends a Credit-Control-Request message with the UPDATE_REQUEST type.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.NbrUeWithSession.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of UEs holding at least one active Smp session in the SGSN for GSM network.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionReauthAtt.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempts of Smp session re-authorization from the SAPC to the SGSN from GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN receives a Re-Auth-Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.SessionUpdateSucc.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Smp session update procedures initiated by the SGSN for GSM network. This counter is incremented each time the SGSN receives a successful Credit-Control-Answer message with the UPDATE_REQUEST type.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sx.NbrActSessions.G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active Smp sessions in the SGSN for GSM network.

EntityDef.name: gsnOverloadProtectionIgnoredOutboundRequestsSapc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of outgoing request messages toward the SAPC that have been rejected by the outbound overload protection mechanism in the GSM network. This counter is incremented each time a Credit-Control-Request message toward the SAPC is rejected by the outbound overload protection mechanism. Note: This counter is now deprecated.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_SEC_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT_SEC_E area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SEC.AuthFailUe.20.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 20 (MAC failure) for NB-IoT UEs. The counter is increased whenever the NB-IoT UE detects an incorrect authentication parameter in the Authentication Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SEC.AuthFailUe.21.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 21 (Sync failure) for NB-IoT UEs. The counter is increased whenever the NB-IoT UE detects an incorrect SQN or a SQN is out of range.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SEC.AuthFailUe.26.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of authentication failures due to cause code 26 (Non-EPS authentication unacceptable) for NB-IoT UEs. The counter is increased whenever the NB-IoT UE detects an incorrect authentication parameter in the Authentication Request message.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SEC.AuthFailMme.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Authentication Reject messages sent by the MME to NB-IoT UEs.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.SEC.AuthAtt.NB
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Authentication Request messages sent by the MME to NB-IoT UEs.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_T6a_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT T6a area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ScefInitCMRUpdateSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Connection Management Answer messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface, indicating the successful update of the T6a connection to the SCEF. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a Connection Management Answer message indicating the successful update of the T6a connection to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.TDRAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Mobile Terminated Data Request messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a MT Data Request message from the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.TDRSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Mobile Terminated Data Answer messages sent from the MME to the SCEF. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a successful MT Data Answer message to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMRUpdateSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Connection Management Answer messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface, indicating the successful update of the T6a connection to the SCEF. This counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a Connection Management Answer message indicating the successful update of the T6a connection to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ScefInitCMRReleaseAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Management Request messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface with a request for T6a connection release. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a Connection Management Request message from the SCEF with a request for connection release.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ODRSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Mobile Originated Data Answer messages sent from the SCEF to the MME. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a successful MO Data Answer message from the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ScefInitCMRReleaseSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Connection Management Answer messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface, indicating the successful release of the T6a connection to the SCEF. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a Connection Management Answer message indicating the successful release of the T6a connection to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ODRAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Mobile Originated Data Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a MO Data Request message to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.TDRFailDueToUeTempUnreachable.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Mobile Terminated Data Answer messages sent from the MME to the SCEF that have failed with a result code "DIAMETER_ERROR_USER_TEMPORARILY_UNREACHABLE (5653)" for the following reasons: 1.The UE is in PSM or eDRX. 2.No paging response is received from the UE after the SCEF Wait Time expires.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMRReleaseSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Connection Management Answer messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface, indicating the successful release of the T6a connection to the SCEF. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a Connection Management Answer message indicating the successful release of the T6a connection to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMRReleaseAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Management Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface with a request for T6a connection release. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a Connection Management Request message to the SCEF with a request for connection release.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMREstablishmentAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Management Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface with a request for T6a connection establishment. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a Connection Management Request message to the SCEF with a request for connection establishment.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitRIRAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Reporting Information Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF. This counter is incremented each time the MME sends a Reporting Information Request message to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMREstablishmentSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Connection Management Answer messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface, indicating the successful establishment of the T6a connection to the SCEF. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a Connection Management Answer message indicating the successful establishment of the T6a connection to the SCEF.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitRIRSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful Reporting Information Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF. This counter is incremented when the MME receives a Reporting Information Answer message from the SCEF indicating a successful procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.MmeInitCMRUpdateAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Management Request messages sent from the MME to the SCEF over the T6a interface with a request for T6a connection update. The counter is incremented each time when the MME sends a Connection Management Request message to the SCEF with a request for connection update.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.T6a.ScefInitCMRUpdateAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of Connection Management Request messages sent from the SCEF to the MME over the T6a interface with a request for T6a connection update. The counter is incremented each time when the MME receives a Connection Management Request message from the SCEF with a request for connection update.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_MONTE_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT MONTE area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MONTE.NbrLossOfConnectivity.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active Loss of Connectivity monitoring event configurations. This gauge is incremented with every new Loss of Connectivity monitoring event configuration and decremented when a Loss of Connectivity configuration has been fully reported or deleted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MONTE.NbrLocationReporting.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active Location Reporting monitoring event configurations. This gauge is incremented with every new Location Reporting monitoring event configuration and decremented when a Location Reporting configuration has been fully reported or deleted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MONTE.NbrAvailabilityAfterDDNFailure.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active Availability After DDN Failure monitoring event configurations. This gauge is incremented with every new Availability After DDN Failure monitoring event configuration and decremented when an Availability After DDN Failure configuration has been deleted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MONTE.NbrUeReachability.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active UE Reachability monitoring event configurations. This gauge is incremented with every new UE Reachability monitoring event configuration and decremented when a UE Reachability configuration has been fully reported or deleted.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.MONTE.NbrCommunicationFailure.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of active Communication Failure monitoring event configurations. This gauge is incremented with every new Communication Failure monitoring event configuration and decremented when a Communication Failure configuration has been fully reported or deleted.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_IoT_S6a_E
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the IoT S6a area.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.S6a.ULAMonteConfFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of faulty MONTE configurations received in subscription data across all Update Location procedures.

EntityDef.name: VS.IoT.S6a.IDRMonteConfFail.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of faulty MONTE configurations received in subscription data across all Insert Subscriber Data procedures.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_SGd
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the SGd area.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgd.MoSmsSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful MO-SMS Message Forwarding procedures initiated by the MME over the SGd interface. This counter is incremented when the MME receives an MO Forward Short Message Answer message with success from the SMS-IWMSC.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgd.MoSmsAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted MO-SMS Message Forwarding procedures initiated by the MME over the SGd interface. This counter is incremented when the MME sends an MO Forward Short Message Request message to the SMS-IWMSC.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgd.MtSmsAtt.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted MT-SMS Message Forwarding procedures initiated by the SMS-GMSC over the SGd interface. This counter is incremented when the MME receives an MT Forward Short Message Request message from the SMS-GMSC.

EntityDef.name: VS.Sgd.MtSmsSucc.E
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful MT-SMS Message Forwarding procedures initiated by the SMS-GMSC over the SGd interface. This counter is incremented when the MME sends an MT Forward Short Message Answer message with success to the SMS-GMSC.

EntityDef.name: AMF_Mobility_5GMM
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Mobility_5GMM area.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.PagingSucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of successful paging procedures, irrespective of the paging being an initial paging request or the resending of paging request. The counter is incremented when a Service Request or any N1 message from UE is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.PagingAtt.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of paging messages sent by the AMF. The counter is incremented when a paging procedure is started, that is at the transmission of the first paging message with the current S-TMSI in the procedure.

EntityDef.name: VS.RM.RegInitSucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful initial registrations at the AMF.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.N2ReleaseReq.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of N2 releases request received in the AMF. Trigger: Receiving UE Context Release Request initiated by NG-RAN.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqDataUnsucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Service Request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE set to data is received from the UE and Service Reject message is sent to UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.N2Release.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of N2 releases in the AMF. Both NG-RAN and AMF initiated releases are counted. Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the NG-RAN.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.N2ReleaseUserInactivity.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of NG-RAN-initiated N2 releases due to cause "User Inactivity". Trigger: Sending UE Context Release Command to the NG-RAN, after receiving a UE Context Release Request from the NG-RAN with cause "User Inactivity".

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqSignallingAtt.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Service request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE set to 'signalling' is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.N2ReleaseRedirection.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of N2 Releases initiated by the AMF when it receives the 'UE Context Release Request' message with the Cause 'Redirection' from the NG-RAN. The counter is incremented when the AMF sends the 'UE Context Release Command' message to the NG-RAN as a response to the 'UE Context Release Request' message with the Cause 'Redirection', from the NG-RAN.

EntityDef.name: VS.RM.RegInitReq.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of initial registration requests received by the AMF.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqDataAtt.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Service request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE set to 'data' is received from the UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqMTAtt.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted Service request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE 'mobile terminated services' is received.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.N2ReleaseRadioConnectionLost.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of N2 Releases initiated by the AMF when it receives the 'UE Context Release Request' message with the Cause 'Radio connection with UE lost' from the NG-RAN. The counter is incremented when the AMF sends the 'UE Context Release Command' message as a response to the 'UE Context Release Request' message with the Cause 'Radio connection with UE lost', from the NG-RAN.

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqSignallingUnsucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Service Request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE set to 'signalling' is received from the UE and Service Reject message is sent to UE.

EntityDef.name: VS.RM.RegisteredSubNbr.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of currently registered #NPS# subscribers within this #AMF# area. The gauge will be incremented or decremented when the #UE# enters or leaves the #AMF#, for example, due to Registration, Inter-#AMF# #TA# Update, Deregistration or Implicit Deregistration Note: The triggering and clearing levels needs to be changed manually or by triggering a small restart when the #SAU# capacity license value is changed.
EntityDef.alarmRaiseDefaultLevel: value of 90% of the SAU capacity license limit
EntityDef.alarmClearDefaultLevel: value of 85% of the SAU capacity license limit

EntityDef.name: VS.5GMM.ServiceReqMTUnsucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of unsuccessful Service Request procedures in the AMF. It is incremented when an Service Request with service type IE set to 'mobile terminated services' is received from the UE and Service Reject message is sent to UE.

EntityDef.name: AMF_NRF_5G
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the NRF communication area.

EntityDef.name: VS.NRF.NfDiscoverCacheHit.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of #NG_RAN# Nnrf_NFDiscovery requests that was responded from the local cache and not resulted in signaling to external NRF. Trigger: Returning Nnrf_NFDiscovery SearchResult from local cache.

EntityDef.name: VS.NRF.NfDiscoverSucc.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful #NG_RAN# Nnrf_NFDiscovery responses received from NRF. Trigger: Reception of the Nnrf_NFDiscovery response from the NRF with a successful result code.

EntityDef.name: VS.NRF.NfDiscoverAtt.5G
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of attempted #NG_RAN# Nnrf_NFDiscovery requests sent to NRF. Trigger: Sending the Nnrf_NFDiscovery request to the NRF over the serviced based interface.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_Session_SM
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the Session_SM area.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.HomeApnOiReplaceSucc
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of successful DNS query and static gateway selection with APN-OI-Replacement, while the UE is a home subscriber.

EntityDef.name: VS.SM.HomeApnOiReplaceAtt
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of DNS query and static gateway selection attempts with APN-OI-Replacement, while the UE is a home subscriber.

EntityDef.name: SGSN-MME_ISP_Escalation_Rules
EntityDef.description: This PmGroup defines measurement types within the ISP_Escalation_Rules area.

EntityDef.name: nbrAPSyncFailed
EntityDef.description: This counter provides the number of suppressed AP restarts due to synchronization failure between APs caused by the TCP connection between them is lost.

EntityDef.name: nbrAPTakeoverTimeout
EntityDef.description: This counter provides the number of suppressed large restarts when the Overall Recovery Timer expires during an AP takeover and AP loss or AP gain is ongoing.

EntityDef.name: nbrConnectionCleanupFailed
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the total number of suppressed small restarts, DP restarts, or both, small restarts and DP restarts, if time-outs occur during a connection data cleanup procedure. The counter is incremented when a possible small restart or a DP restart is skipped if time-outs occur during a connection data cleanup procedure.

EntityDef.name: nbrSLREscalationSkipped
EntityDef.description: This measurement provides the number of suppressed escalations from a small local restart. The counter is incremented when a possible small restart is skipped after three small local restarts on the same AP during a 15-minute time interval.
